atk-s0508a11:3_0: Idāni channāme kuṭikātiādinayappavattānaṁ theragāthānaṁ atthavaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-s0508a11:3_1: Sā panāyaṁ atthavaṇṇanā yasmā tāsaṁ tāsaṁ gāthānaṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ pakāsetvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti suviññeyyā ca.
atk-s0508a11:3_2: Tasmā tattha tattha aṭṭhuppattiṁ pakāsetvā atthavaṇṇanaṁ karissāmāti.
atk-s0508a11:4_0: Tattha channā me kuṭikātigāthāya kā uppatti? Vuccate –
atk-s0508a11:4_1: ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake anuppanneyeva padumuttare bhagavati lokanāthe haṁsavatīnāmake nagare
atk-s0508a11:4_4: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṁ apassanto attano parivārabhūtehi catucattālīsāya māṇavakasahassehi
atk-s0508a11:4_5: saddhiṁ pabbatapāde isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattesi.
atk-s0508a11:5_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā haṁsavatīnagaraṁ upanissāya viharanto ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a11:5_1: paccūsasamaye lokaṁ volokento nandatāpasassa antevāsikajaṭilānaṁ arahattūpanissayaṁ nandatāpasassa ca
atk-s0508a11:5_2: dvīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāvakaṭṭhānantarassa patthanaṁ disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṁ katvā pubbaṇhasamaye
atk-s0508a11:5_3: pattacīvaramādāya aññaṁ kañci anāmantetvā sīho viya ekacaro nandatāpasassa antevāsikesu phalāphalatthāya
atk-s0508a11:5_4: gatesu “buddhabhāvaṁ me jānātū”ti passantasseva nandatāpasassa ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:5_5: Nandatāpaso buddhānubhāvañceva lakkhaṇapāripūriñca disvā lakkhaṇamante sammasitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato
atk-s0508a11:5_6: nāma agāraṁ ajjhāvasanto rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0508a11:5_7: pabbajanto loke vivaṭacchado sabbaññū buddho hoti.
atk-s0508a11:5_8: Ayaṁ purisājānīyo nissaṁsayaṁ buddhoti ñatvā paccuggamanaṁ katvā,
atk-s0508a11:5_12: Nandatāpasopi attano anucchavikaṁ āsanaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a11:6_0: Tasmiṁ samaye catucattālīsasahassajaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā ācariyassa santikaṁ
atk-s0508a11:6_1: sampattā buddhānañceva ācariyassa ca nisinnāsanaṁ olokentā āhaṁsu – “ācariya,
atk-s0508a11:6_2: mayaṁ ‘imasmiṁ loke tumhehi mahantataro natthī’ti vicarāma,
atk-s0508a11:6_3: ayaṁ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti.
atk-s0508a11:6_6: sāsapena saddhiṁ aṭṭhasaṭṭhisatasahassayojanubbedhaṁ sineruṁ upametuṁ icchatha,
atk-s0508a11:6_7: sabbaññubuddhena saddhiṁ mā maṁ upamitthā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a11:6_8: Atha te tāpasā “sace ayaṁ orako abhavissa,
atk-s0508a11:6_9: na amhākaṁ ācariyo evaṁ upamaṁ āhareyya,
atk-s0508a11:6_10: yāva mahā vatāyaṁ purisājānīyo”ti pādesu nipatitvā sirasā vandiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:6_15: tumhe yaṁ yaṁ paṇītaṁ phalāphalaṁ ānītaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:6_16: taṁ taṁ āharathā”ti vatvā āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā sayaṁ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a11:6_17: Satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā dibbojaṁ pakkhipiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:6_19: Tato bhojanakiccaṁ niṭṭhāpetvā nisinne satthari sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṁ kathaṁ kathento nisīdi.
atk-s0508a11:6_21: Bhikkhū satthu cittaṁ ñatvā satasahassamattā khīṇāsavā āgantvā satthāraṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhaṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:7_3: tumhehi ajja uḷāraṁ bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca sakkāraṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0508a11:7_5: Acinteyyattā iddhivisayassa muhutteneva vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhānaṁ yojanappamāṇaṁ pupphāsanaṁ paññāpesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:7_9: Evaṁ paññattesu āsanesu nandatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṁ paggayha ṭhito, “bhante,
atk-s0508a11:7_10: mayhaṁ dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāya imaṁ pupphāsanaṁ abhiruhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a11:7_12: Evaṁ nisinne satthari satthu ākāraṁ ñatvā bhikkhū attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:7_13: Nandatāpaso mahantaṁ pupphachattaṁ gahetvā tathāgatassa matthake dhārento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:7_14: Satthā “tāpasānaṁ ayaṁ sakkāro mahapphalo hotū”ti nirodhasamāpattiṁ samāpajji.
atk-s0508a11:7_16: Tathāgate sattāhaṁ nirodhaṁ samāpajjitvā nisinne antevāsikā bhikkhācārakāle sampatte vanamūlaphalāphalaṁ
atk-s0508a11:7_17: paribhuñjitvā sesakāle buddhānaṁ añjaliṁ paggayha tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0508a11:7_18: Nandatāpaso pana bhikkhācārampi agantvā pupphachattaṁ dhārento sattāhaṁ pītisukheneva vītināmeti.
atk-s0508a11:8_0: Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya araṇavihāriaṅgena dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi samannāgataṁ ekaṁ sāvakaṁ
atk-s0508a11:8_2: So cakkavattirañño santikā paṭiladdhamahālābho mahāyodho viya tuṭṭhamānaso attano visaye ṭhatvā tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ sammasitvā anumodanaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:8_3: Tassa desanāvasāne satthā sayaṁ dhammaṁ desesi.
atk-s0508a11:8_8: Aṭṭha parikkhārā kāye paṭimukkāva ahesuṁ saṭṭhivassattherā viya satthāraṁ parivārayiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:8_10: Tassa kira araṇavihārittherassa santike dhammaṁ sotuṁ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya “aho vatāhampi anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa
atk-s0508a11:8_11: sāsane iminā sāvakena laddhadhuraṁ labheyya”nti cittaṁ udapādi.
atk-s0508a11:8_12: So tena parivitakkena maggaphalapaṭivedhaṁ kātuṁ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a11:8_13: Tathāgataṁ pana vanditvā sammukhe ṭhatvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0508a11:8_16: “Araṇavihāriaṅge dakkhiṇeyyaaṅge ca etadaggaṁ patto eso bhikkhū”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0508a11:8_17: yvāyaṁ mayā sattāhaṁ pupphachattaṁ dhārentena sakkāro kato,
atk-s0508a11:8_18: tena adhikārena na aññaṁ sampattiṁ patthemi,
atk-s0508a11:8_19: anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṁ thero viya dvīhaṅgehi samannāgato sāvako bhaveyya”nti patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0508a11:9_1: kho imassa tāpasassa patthanā”ti anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ pesetvā olokento kappasatasahassaṁ atikkamitvā samijjhanakabhāvaṁ disvā nandatāpasaṁ āha –
atk-s0508a11:9_3: anāgate kappasatasahassaṁ atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0508a11:9_4: tassa santike samijjhissatī”ti vatvā dhammakathaṁ kathetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ākāsaṁ pakkhandi.
atk-s0508a11:9_5: Nandatāpaso yāva cakkhupathasamatikkamā satthāraṁ bhikkhusaṅghañca uddissa añjaliṁ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:9_6: So aparabhāge kālena kālaṁ satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ suṇi.
atk-s0508a11:9_8: Tato pana cuto aparānipi pañca jātisatāni pabbajitvā āraññako ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:9_9: Kassapasammāsambuddhakālepi pabbajitvā āraññako hutvā gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūresi.
atk-s0508a11:9_10: Etaṁ kira vattaṁ aparipūretvā mahāsāvakabhāvaṁ pāpuṇantā nāma natthi.
atk-s0508a11:9_12: So vīsativassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūretvā kālaṅkatvā kāmāvacaradevaloke tāvatiṁsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:14_0: “Phalaṁ mūlañca paṇṇañca, na bhuñjāmi ahaṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a11:21_0: Muyhase mohanīye ca, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:23_0: Mā kho visuddhaṁ dūsesi, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:25_0: Ubhopi mā virādhesi, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:27_0: Neva gāme araññe vā, na hi taṁ kaṭṭhasammataṁ.
atk-s0508a11:28_0: “Chavālātūpamo tvaṁ si, na gihī nāpi saññato;
atk-s0508a11:29_0: Ubhato muttako ajja, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:30_0: “Siyā nu kho tava etaṁ, ko pajānāti te idaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:35_0: Saṁvāsaṁ alabhanto hi, kathaṁ jīvihisi tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:37_0: Balī nāgo upagantvā, yūthā nīharate gajaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:38_0: “Yūthā vinissaṭo santo, sukhaṁ sātaṁ na vindati;
atk-s0508a11:41_0: Tehi tvaṁ nissaṭo santo, sukhaṁ sātaṁ na lacchasi.
atk-s0508a11:45_0: Tathā sīlavīhino tvaṁ, na jhāyissasi katthaci.
atk-s0508a11:47_0: Mattikaṁ pettikañcāpi, natthi te nihitaṁ dhanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:49_0: Evaṁ jīvihisi gehe, sādhu te taṁ na ruccati.
atk-s0508a11:63_0: Maṇi yathā jotiraso, ākāse caṅkamī tadā.
atk-s0508a11:67_0: Devo nu kho ayaṁ satto, udāhu manujo ayaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:68_0: “Na me suto vā diṭṭho vā, mahiyā ediso naro;
atk-s0508a11:69_0: Api mantapadaṁ atthi, ayaṁ satthā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:89_0: Bhoge te ūnatā natthi, buddhānussatiyā phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:91_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:95_0: Subhūti nāma nāmena, hessasi satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a11:109_0: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhānussatiyā phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:114_0: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā subhūtitthero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
atk-s0508a11:115_0: Evaṁ pana so tāvatiṁsabhavane aparāparaṁ uppajjanavasena dibbasampattiṁ anubhavitvā tato cuto manussaloke
atk-s0508a11:115_1: anekasatakkhattuṁ cakkavattirājā ca padesarājā ca hutvā uḷāraṁ manussasampattiṁ anubhavitvā atha amhākaṁ
atk-s0508a11:115_2: bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṁ sumanaseṭṭhissa gehe anāthapiṇḍikassa kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti “subhūtī”tissa
atk-s0508a11:116_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṁ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṁ gantvā tattha
atk-s0508a11:116_1: veḷuvanapaṭiggahaṇādinā lokānuggahaṁ karonto rājagahaṁ upanissāya sītavane viharati.
atk-s0508a11:116_2: Tadā anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi sāvatthiyaṁ uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṁ gahetvā attano sahāyassa rājagahaseṭṭhino gharaṁ
atk-s0508a11:116_3: gato buddhuppādaṁ sutvā satthāraṁ sītavane viharantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphale
atk-s0508a11:116_4: patiṭṭhāya satthāraṁ sāvatthiṁ āgamanatthāya yācitvā tato pañcacattālīsayojane magge yojane yojane satasahassapariccāgena
atk-s0508a11:116_5: vihāre patiṭṭhāpetvā sāvatthiyaṁ rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṁ jetassa rājakumārassa uyyānabhūmiṁ koṭisanthārena
atk-s0508a11:116_6: kiṇitvā tattha bhagavato vihāraṁ kāretvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:116_7: Vihārapariggahaṇadivase ayaṁ subhūtikuṭumbiko anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhinā saddhiṁ gantvā dhammaṁ suṇanto saddhaṁ paṭilabhitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0508a11:116_8: So upasampajjitvā dve mātikā paguṇā katvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ kathāpetvā araññe samaṇadhammaṁ karonto mettājhānapādakaṁ
atk-s0508a11:116_10: So dhammaṁ desento yasmā satthārā desitaniyāmena anodissakaṁ katvā dhammaṁ deseti.
atk-s0508a11:116_12: Piṇḍāya caranto ghare ghare mettājhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya bhikkhaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti “evaṁ dāyakānaṁ mahapphalaṁ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0508a11:116_17: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ araṇavihārīnaṁ yadidaṁ subhūti,
atk-s0508a11:116_19: Evamayaṁ mahāthero arahatte patiṭṭhāya attanā pūritapāramīnaṁ phalassa matthakaṁ patvā loke abhiññāto
atk-s0508a11:116_20: abhilakkhito hutvā bahujanahitāya janapadacārikaṁ caranto anupubbena rājagahaṁ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a11:117_0: Rājā bimbisāro therassa āgamanaṁ sutvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “idheva, bhante,
atk-s0508a11:117_4: Manussā avuṭṭhitāya upaddutā rañño nivesanadvāre ukkuṭṭhimakaṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:117_5: Rājā “kena nu kho kāraṇena devo na vassatī”ti vīmaṁsanto “therassa abbhokāsavāsena maññe na vassatī”ti cintetvā tassa paṇṇakuṭiṁ kārāpetvā “imissā, bhante,
atk-s0508a11:117_7: Thero kuṭikaṁ pavisitvā tiṇasanthārake pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0508a11:117_8: Tadā pana devo thokaṁ thokaṁ phusāyati,
atk-s0508a11:117_10: Atha thero lokassa avuṭṭhikabhayaṁ visamitukāmo attano ajjhattikabāhiravatthukassa parissayassa abhāvaṁ pavedento –
atk-s0508a11:119_0: “Channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā, vassa deva yathāsukhaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:120_0: Cittaṁ me susamāhitaṁ vimuttaṁ, ātāpī viharāmi vassa devā”ti. –
atk-s0508a11:122_1: saddo tāva “channā sā kumārikā imassa kumārakassa” “nacchannaṁ nappatirūpa”ntiādīsu patirūpe āgato.
atk-s0508a11:122_6: “Kyāhaṁ te nacchannopi karissāmī”tiādīsu nivāsanapārupane “āyasmā channo anācāraṁ ācaratī”tiādīsu paññattiyaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:122_8: channā kuṭi āhito ginī”ti ca ādīsu tiṇādīhi chādane.
atk-s0508a11:122_10: tasmā tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā channā yathā na vassati vassodakapatanaṁ na hoti na ovassati,
atk-s0508a11:123_9: sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato”ādīsu sāmiatthe āgato.
atk-s0508a11:123_12: Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavānaṁ mamāyitabbaṁ nāma kiñci natthi lokadhammehi anupalittabhāvato,
atk-s0508a11:123_13: lokasamaññāvasena pana tesampi “ahaṁ mamā”ti vohāramattaṁ hoti.
atk-s0508a11:124_0: Kuṭikāti pana mātukucchipi karajakāyopi tiṇādicchadano patissayopi vuccati. Tathā hi –
atk-s0508a11:126_0: Putte santānake brūsi, taṇhā me brūsi bandhana”nti. –
atk-s0508a11:130_1: “Kassapassa bhagavato bhagini kuṭi ovassati” “kuṭi nāma ullittā vā hoti avalittā vā”tiādīsu tiṇachadanapatissayo.
atk-s0508a11:130_2: Idhāpi so eva veditabbo paṇṇasālāya adhippetattā.
atk-s0508a11:131_15: na sukaraṁ akkhānena pāpuṇituṁ yāva sukhā saggā”tiādīsu sukhappaccayaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0508a11:131_19: Sā hi kuṭi anto bahi ca manāpabhāvena sampāditā nivāsanaphāsutāya “sukhā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0508a11:132_3: Savāte hi senāsane utusappāyo na labbhati,
atk-s0508a11:132_9: chandaṁ janehi jīvite apekkha”ntiādīsu sammutideve khattiye āgato.
atk-s0508a11:132_13: Visuddhidevānañhi bhagavato atidevabhāve vutte itaresaṁ vutto eva hoti.
atk-s0508a11:132_15: “Devo ca kālena kālaṁ na sammā dhāraṁ anuppavecchatī”tiādīsu meghe pajjunne vā.
atk-s0508a11:132_17: Vassāti hi te āṇāpento thero ālapati.
atk-s0508a11:132_19: Tava vassanena mayhaṁ bāhiro parissayo natthi,
atk-s0508a11:132_20: tasmā yathākāmaṁ vassāti vassūpajīvisatte anuggaṇhanto vadati.
atk-s0508a11:133_1: Tattha cittaṁ me susamāhitanti mama cittaṁ suṭṭhu ativiya sammā sammadeva ekaggabhāvena ārammaṇe ṭhapitaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:133_3: api ca kho vimuttaṁ orambhāgiyauddhaṁbhāgiyasaṅgahehi sabbasaṁyojanehi sabbakilesadhammato ca visesena vimuttaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:133_4: samucchedappahānavasena paṭipassaddhippahānavasena te pajahitvā ṭhitanti attho.
atk-s0508a11:133_6: Phalasamāpattiatthaṁ vipassanārambhavasena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthañca āraddhavīriyo hutvā viharāmi,
atk-s0508a11:134_5: bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu kāyoti āgato. “Siñca, bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a11:134_9: gahakūṭaṁ visaṅkhata”nti ca ādīsu gahanti āgato.
atk-s0508a11:134_11: tiṭṭhaṁ naro mohanasmiṁ pagāḷho”tiādīsu guhāti āgato.
atk-s0508a11:134_17: Attabhāvo hi kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca labbhamānā gehanāmikā kuṭikā viya aṭṭhiādisaññite pathavīdhātuādike phassādike
atk-s0508a11:138_0: Sā panesā attabhāvakuṭikā therassa tiṇṇaṁ channaṁ aṭṭhannañca asaṁvaradvārānaṁ vasena samati vijjhanakassa
atk-s0508a11:138_1: rāgādiavassutassa paññāya saṁvutattā sammadeva pihitattā “channā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0508a11:138_5: Vuttanayena channattā eva kilesadukkhābhāvato nirāmisasukhasamaṅgitāya ca sukhā sukhappattā,
atk-s0508a11:138_6: tato eva ca nivātā nihatamānamadathambhasārambhatāya nivātavuttikā.
atk-s0508a11:138_7: Ayañca nayo “mayhaṁ na saṁkilesadhammānaṁ saṁvaraṇamattena siddho,
atk-s0508a11:138_8: atha kho aggamaggasamādhinā suṭṭhu samāhitacittatāya ceva aggamaggapaññāya sabbasaṁyojanehi vippamuttacittatāya
atk-s0508a11:138_9: cā”ti dassento āha “cittaṁ me susamāhitaṁ vimutta”nti.
atk-s0508a11:138_10: Evaṁbhūto ca “idānāhaṁ katakaraṇīyo”ti na appossukko homi,
atk-s0508a11:138_12: sadevakassa lokassa hitasukhūpasaṁhāre ussāhajāto bhikkhācārakālepi anugharaṁ brahmavihāreneva viharāmi.
atk-s0508a11:138_14: pajjunna mayhaṁ piyaṁ kātukāmatāyapi vassūpajīvīnaṁ sattānaṁ anukampāyapi vassa sammā dhāraṁ anuppavecchāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0508a11:139_0: Ettha ca thero “channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā”ti iminā lokiyalokuttarabhedaṁ attano adhisīlasikkhaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a11:139_4: Atha vā “channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā”ti iminā animittavihāraṁ dasseti kilesavassapidhānamukhena niccādinimittugghāṭanadīpanato.
atk-s0508a11:139_7: “Ātāpī viharāmī”ti iminā tesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vihārānaṁ adhigamūpāyaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:139_11: Tathā dutiyena paṭhamadutiyehi vā dhammavihārasampattiyo dasseti.
atk-s0508a11:139_13: “Ātāpī viharāmī”ti iminā parahitapaṭipattiyaṁ atanditabhāvaṁ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:140_0: Evaṁ “yathānāmā”ti gāthāya vuttānaṁ dhammavihārādīnaṁ imāya gāthāya dassitattā tattha adassitesu nāmagottesu
atk-s0508a11:140_9: na tathā gottenāti “itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā subhūtī”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:140_20: Iti sundarāya sarīrāvayavavibhūtiyā sīlasampattiyādivibhūtiyā ca samannāgatattā subhūtīti paññāyittha sīlasārādithiraguṇayogato thero.
atk-s0508a11:140_22: Kasmā panete mahātherā attano guṇe pakāsentīti?
atk-s0508a11:140_23: Iminā dīghena addhunā anadhigatapubbaṁ paramagambhīraṁ ativiya santaṁ paṇītaṁ attanā adhigataṁ lokuttaradhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:140_24: paccavekkhitvā pītivegasamussāhitaudānavasena sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvavibhāvanavasena ca paramappicchā
atk-s0508a11:144_2: Ayampi thero padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto mātāpitūnaṁ
atk-s0508a11:144_3: accayena kuṭumbaṁ saṇṭhapetvā gharāvāsaṁ vasanto ekadivasaṁ padumuttarassa bhagavato dhammadesanākāle
atk-s0508a11:144_4: haṁsavatīnagaravāsike gandhamālādihatthe yena buddho yena dhammo yena saṅgho,
atk-s0508a11:144_5: tanninne tappoṇe tappabbhāre gacchante disvā mahājanena saddhiṁ upagato satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:144_6: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā “ayaṁ kira imasmiṁ sāsane paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ aggo,
atk-s0508a11:144_7: aho vatāhampi ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṁ viya paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ aggo bhaveyya”nti cintetvā satthu
atk-s0508a11:144_11: So bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā sakanivesanaṁ gantvā sabbarattiṁ buddhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a11:144_12: ca nisajjaṭṭhānaṁ gandhadāmamālādāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā tassā
atk-s0508a11:144_13: rattiyā accayena sake nivesane bhikkhusatasahassaparivāraṁ bhagavantaṁ vividhayāgukhajjakaparivāraṁ nānārasasūpabyañjanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:144_16: ahaṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthemi na kho pana mayhaṁ yuttaṁ ekadivasameva dānaṁ datvā taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthetuṁ,
atk-s0508a11:144_17: anupaṭipāṭiyā satta divase dānaṁ datvā patthessāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a11:144_18: So teneva niyāmena satta divase mahādānāni datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne dussakoṭṭhāgāraṁ vivarāpetvā uttamaṁ
atk-s0508a11:144_19: ticīvarappahonakaṁ sukhumavatthaṁ buddhassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā bhikkhusatasahassassa ca ticīvaraṁ datvā
atk-s0508a11:144_21: yo so bhikkhu tumhehi ito sattamadivasamatthake etadagge ṭhapito,
atk-s0508a11:144_22: ahampi so bhikkhu viya anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ aggo bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0508a11:144_23: vatvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā patthanaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:144_24: Satthā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṁ disvā “anāgate ito kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati,
atk-s0508a11:144_25: tassa sāsane tava patthanā samijjhissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a11:156_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:160_0: Atthe dhamme nirutte ca, paṭibhāne ca kovidaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:164_0: Nipacca pādamūlamhi, taṁ ṭhānaṁ patthayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:172_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:174_0: Koṭṭhiko nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a11:175_0: “Taṁ sutvā mudito hutvā, yāvajīvaṁ tadā jinaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:182_0: Sabbattha sukhito āsiṁ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
atk-s0508a11:184_0: Aññaṁ gatiṁ na gacchāmi, suciṇṇassa idaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:186_0: Nīce kule na jāyāmi, suciṇṇassa idaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:190_0: Yadā me pitaraṁ buddho, vinayī sabbasuddhiyā.
atk-s0508a11:196_0: Pabhinnā tena lokaggo, etadagge ṭhapesi maṁ.
atk-s0508a11:201_0: “Svāgataṁ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a11:202_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:205_0: Evaṁ so tattha tattha bhave puññañāṇasambhāraṁ sambharanto aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:205_3: So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippe nipphattiṁ gato ekadivasaṁ satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:205_4: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0508a11:205_5: arahattaṁ patvā paṭisambhidāsu ciṇṇavasī hutvā abhiññāte abhiññāte mahāthere upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchantopi
atk-s0508a11:205_6: dasabalaṁ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchantopi paṭisambhidāsuyeva pañhaṁ pucchi.
atk-s0508a11:205_7: Evamayaṁ thero tattha katādhikāratāya ciṇṇavasībhāvena ca paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ aggo jāto.
atk-s0508a11:205_8: Atha naṁ satthā mahāvedallasuttaṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ katvā paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi –
atk-s0508a11:205_11: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ yadidaṁ mahākoṭṭhiko”ti.
atk-s0508a11:205_12: So aparena samayena vimuttisukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedento udānavasena –
atk-s0508a11:209_0: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā mahākoṭṭhikatthero gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:210_0: Tattha upasantoti manacchaṭṭhānaṁ indriyānaṁ upasamanena nibbisevanabhāvakaraṇena upasanto.
atk-s0508a11:210_6: dubbhāsitato vinā attano bhāsanavasena caturaṅgasamannāgataṁ subhāsitaṁyeva bhaṇatīti attho.
atk-s0508a11:210_7: Jātiādivasena attano anukkaṁsanato na uddhatoti anuddhato atha vā tiṇṇaṁ kāyaduccaritānaṁ vūpasamanena tato paṭiviratiyā upasanto,
atk-s0508a11:210_11: Evaṁ pana tividhaduccaritappahānena suddhe sīle patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0508a11:210_13: tameva samādhiṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ katvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā dhunāti pāpake dhamme lāmakaṭṭhena pāpake sabbepi saṁkilesadhamme niddhunāti,
atk-s0508a11:210_17: yathā nāma dumassa rukkhassa pattaṁ paṇḍupalāsaṁ māluto vāto dhunāti,
atk-s0508a11:210_19: evaṁ yathāvuttapaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhito pāpadhamme attano santānato nīharati,
atk-s0508a11:210_20: evamayaṁ therassa aññāpadesena aññābyākaraṇagāthāpi hotīti veditabbā.
atk-s0508a11:211_2: Evaṁ payogāsayasuddhassa “anuddhato”ti iminā uddhaccābhāvavacanena tadekaṭṭhatāya nīvaraṇappahānaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a11:211_6: “dhunāti pāpake dhamme”ti iminā paññābhāvanā vibhāvitā hoti.
atk-s0508a11:211_11: apāyabhavādīnaṁ samatikkamanūpāyo ca yathārahaṁ niddhāretvā yojetabbā.
atk-s0508a11:211_12: Iminā nayena sesagāthāsupi yathārahaṁ atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0508a11:211_13: Atthamattameva pana tattha tattha apubbaṁ vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0508a11:214_0: Paññaṁ imaṁ passāti āyasmato kaṅkhārevatassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:214_2: Ayampi thero padumuttarabhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatto.
atk-s0508a11:214_3: Ekadivasaṁ buddhānaṁ dhammadesanākāle heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahājanena saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā parisapariyante
atk-s0508a11:214_4: ṭhito dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ jhānābhiratānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā “mayāpi anāgate
atk-s0508a11:214_5: evarūpena bhavituṁ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā desanāvasāne satthāraṁ nimantetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahāsakkāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:214_7: ahaṁ iminā adhikārakammena aññaṁ sampattiṁ na patthemi,
atk-s0508a11:214_8: yathā pana so bhikkhu tumhehi ito sattamadivasamatthake jhāyīnaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito,
atk-s0508a11:214_9: evaṁ ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane jhāyīnaṁ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0508a11:214_10: Satthā anāgataṁ oloketvā nipphajjanabhāvaṁ disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0508a11:214_11: tassa sāsane tvaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a11:215_0: So yāvajīvaṁ kalyāṇakammaṁ katvā kappasatasahassaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaritvā amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle sāvatthinagare
atk-s0508a11:215_1: mahābhogakule nibbatto pacchābhattaṁ dhammassavanatthaṁ gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā
atk-s0508a11:215_2: parisapariyante ṭhito dasabalassa dhammakathaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampadaṁ labhitvā
atk-s0508a11:215_3: kammaṭṭhānaṁ kathāpetvā jhānaparikammaṁ karonto jhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:215_4: So yebhuyyena dasabalena samāpajjitabbasamāpattiṁ samāpajjanto ahorattaṁ jhānesu ciṇṇavasī ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:215_7: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ yadidaṁ kaṅkhārevato”ti jhāyīnaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a11:229_0: Mudito hohi tvaṁ brahme, lacchase taṁ manorathaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:231_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:233_0: Revato nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a11:236_0: “Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jātohaṁ koliye pure;
atk-s0508a11:240_0: “Kaṅkhā me bahulā āsi, kappākappe tahiṁ tahiṁ;
atk-s0508a11:241_0: Sabbaṁ taṁ vinayī buddho, desetvā dhammamuttamaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:243_0: Viharāmi tadā buddho, maṁ disvā etadabravi.
atk-s0508a11:244_0: “Yā kāci kaṅkhā idha vā huraṁ vā, savediyā vā paravediyā vā;
atk-s0508a11:245_0: Ye jhāyino tā pajahanti sabbā, ātāpino brahmacariyaṁ carantā.
atk-s0508a11:246_0: “Satasahasse kataṁ kammaṁ, phalaṁ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a11:252_0: “Svāgataṁ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a11:253_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:256_0: Tathā katakicco panāyaṁ mahāthero pubbe dīgharattaṁ attano kaṅkhāpakatacittataṁ idāni sabbaso vigatakaṅkhatañca
atk-s0508a11:256_2: tenetarahi evaṁ vigatakaṅkho ajjhattaṁ vūpasantacitto jāto”ti sañjātabahumāno bhagavato paññaṁ pasaṁsanto “paññaṁ imaṁ passā”ti imaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a11:257_3: Veneyyānaṁ āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādippakāre dhammānaṁ kusalādike khandhādike ca desetabbappakāre jānāti,
atk-s0508a11:257_8: Tañhi attani siddhena desanābalena nayaggāhato paccakkhaṁ viya upaṭṭhitaṁ gahetvā “ima”nti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:257_9: Yadaggena vā satthu desanāñāṇaṁ sāvakehi nayato gayhati,
atk-s0508a11:257_10: tadaggena attano visaye paṭivedhañāṇampi nayato gayhateva.
atk-s0508a11:257_14: Passāti vimhayappatto aniyamato ālapati attanoyeva vā cittaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:257_17: puthū avijjāya paretaṁ bhūtaṁ bhūtarataṁ bhavā aparimutta”nti.
atk-s0508a11:257_26: abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgatoti evaṁ aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato.
atk-s0508a11:257_34: tathā gatabhāvena tathāgatoti evampi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgatoti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0508a11:257_35: Vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyā udānaṭṭhakathāya itivuttakaṭṭhakathāya ca vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0508a11:258_0: Idāni tassā paññāya asādhāraṇavisesaṁ dassetuṁ “aggi yathā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:258_6: yathā nāma nisīthe rattiyaṁ caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre vattamāne unnate ṭhāne pajjalito aggi tasmiṁ padese tayagataṁ vidhamantaṁ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a11:258_7: evameva tathāgatānaṁ imaṁ desanāñāṇasaṅkhātaṁ sabbaso veneyyānaṁ saṁsayatamaṁ vidhamantaṁ paññaṁ passāti.
atk-s0508a11:258_8: Yato desanāvilāsena sattānaṁ ñāṇamayaṁ ālokaṁ dentīti ālokadā.
atk-s0508a11:258_10: Tadubhayampi kaṅkhāvinayapadaṭṭhānameva katvā dassento “ye āgatānaṁ vinayanti kaṅkha”nti āha,
atk-s0508a11:258_11: ye tathāgatā attano santikaṁ āgatānaṁ upagatānaṁ veneyyānaṁ “ahosiṁ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādinayappavattaṁ soḷasavatthukaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:258_12: “buddhe kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatī”tiādinayappavattaṁ aṭṭhavatthukañca kaṅkhaṁ vicikicchaṁ vinayanti desanānubhāvena
atk-s0508a11:258_14: Vinayakukkuccasaṅkhātā pana kaṅkhā tabbinayeneva vinītā hontīti.
atk-s0508a11:259_1: yathā aggi nisīthe rattibhāge pajjalito paṭutarajālo samujjalaṁ uccāsane ṭhitānaṁ obhāsadānamattena andhakāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:259_3: Accāsanne pana ṭhitānaṁ taṁ supākaṭaṁ karonto cakkhukiccakaraṇato cakkhudado nāma hoti,
atk-s0508a11:259_4: evameva tathāgato attano dhammakāyassa dūre ṭhitānaṁ akatādhikārānaṁ paññāpajjotena mohandhakāraṁ vidhamitvā
atk-s0508a11:259_6: āsanne ṭhitānaṁ pana katādhikārānaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ uppādento cakkhudadā bhavanti.
atk-s0508a11:259_7: Ye evaṁbhūtā attano vacīgocaraṁ āgatānaṁ mādisānampi kaṅkhābahulānaṁ kaṅkhaṁ vinayanti ariyamaggasamuppādanena vidhamanti,
atk-s0508a11:259_8: tesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ paññaṁ ñāṇātisayaṁ passāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a11:259_9: Evamayaṁ therassa attano kaṅkhāvitaraṇappakāsanena aññābyākaraṇagāthāpi hoti.
atk-s0508a11:259_10: Ayañhi thero puthujjanakāle kappiyepi kukkuccako hutvā kaṅkhābahulatāya “kaṅkhārevato”ti paññāto,
atk-s0508a11:262_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa dasabalassa uppattito puretarameva haṁsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatto
atk-s0508a11:262_3: anukkamena viññutaṁ patto satthari loke uppajjante ekadivasaṁ buddhānaṁ dhammadesanākāle heṭṭhā vuttanayena
atk-s0508a11:262_4: mahājanena saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā parisapariyante nisīditvā dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ dhammakathikānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:262_5: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṁ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā desanāvasāne vuṭṭhitāya
atk-s0508a11:262_6: parisāya satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā nimantetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva mahāsakkāraṁ katvā bhagavantaṁ evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0508a11:262_7: ahaṁ iminā adhikārakammena nāññaṁ sampattiṁ patthemi.
atk-s0508a11:262_8: Yathā pana so bhikkhu ito sattamadivasamatthake dhammakathikānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito,
atk-s0508a11:262_9: evaṁ ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane dhammakathikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:262_10: Satthā anāgataṁ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṁ disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0508a11:262_11: tassa sāsane tvaṁ pabbajitvā dhammakathikānaṁ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a11:263_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṁ kalyāṇadhammaṁ katvā tato cuto kappasatasahassaṁ puññañāṇasambhāraṁ sambharanto devamanussesu
atk-s0508a11:263_1: saṁsaritvā amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre doṇavatthunāmake brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule
atk-s0508a11:263_4: So satthari abhisambodhiṁ patvā pavattavaradhammacakke anupubbena rājagahaṁ gantvā taṁ upanissāya viharante
atk-s0508a11:263_5: aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado sabbaṁ pubbakiccaṁ katvā padhānamanuyuñjanto
atk-s0508a11:263_6: pabbajitakiccaṁ matthakaṁ pāpetvāva “dasabalassa santikaṁ gamissāmī”ti mātulattherena saddhiṁ satthu
atk-s0508a11:263_7: santikaṁ agantvā kapilavatthusāmantāyeva ohīyitvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:271_0: Sabbe sissā attamanā, sutvāna mama bhāsato.
atk-s0508a11:279_0: Tassa pana puṇṇattherassa santike pabbajitā kulaputtā pañcasatā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:279_1: Thero sayaṁ dasakathāvatthulābhitāya tepi dasahi kathāvatthūhi ovadi.
atk-s0508a11:279_2: Te tassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbeva arahattaṁ pattā.
atk-s0508a11:279_3: Te attano pabbajitakiccaṁ matthakappattaṁ ñatvā upajjhāyaṁ upasaṅkamitvā āhaṁsu – “bhante,
atk-s0508a11:279_8: “mama dasakathāvatthulābhitaṁ satthā jānāti ahaṁ dhammaṁ desento dasa kathāvatthūni amuñcitvāva desemi,
atk-s0508a11:279_9: mayi gacchante sabbepime bhikkhū maṁ parivāretvā gacchissanti,
atk-s0508a11:279_10: evaṁ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya gantvā pana ayuttaṁ mayhaṁ dasabalaṁ passituṁ,
atk-s0508a11:279_11: ime tāva gantvā passantū”ti te bhikkhū āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0508a11:279_15: Te therā sabbepi dasabalassa jātibhūmiraṭṭhavāsino sabbe khīṇāsavā sabbe dasakathāvatthulābhino attano
atk-s0508a11:279_16: upajjhāyassa ovādaṁ sampaṭicchitvā theraṁ vanditvā anupubbena cārikaṁ carantā saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṁ atikkamma
atk-s0508a11:279_17: rājagahe veḷuvanamahāvihāraṁ gantvā dasabalassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:280_0: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammoditunti bhagavā tehi saddhiṁ – “kacci,
atk-s0508a11:280_2: khamanīya”ntiādinā nayena madhurapaṭisanthāraṁ katvā “kuto ca tumhe,
atk-s0508a11:280_7: jātibhūmiyaṁ jātibhūmakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ evaṁ sambhāvito ‘attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca
atk-s0508a11:280_11: Taṁ kathaṁ sutvā āyasmā sāriputto therassa dassanakāmo ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:280_16: Thero dhammaṁ sutvā dasabalaṁ vanditvā paṭisallānatthāya andhavanaṁ gantvā aññataramhi rukkhamūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a11:281_0: Sāriputtattheropi tassāgamanaṁ sutvā sīsānulokiko gantvā okāsaṁ sallakkhetvā taṁ rukkhamūle nisinnaṁ upasaṅkamitvā therena saddhiṁ sammoditvā,
atk-s0508a11:281_2: Theropissa pucchitapucchitaṁ byākaronto rathavinītūpamāya cittaṁ ārādhesi,
atk-s0508a11:281_4: Atha satthā aparabhāge bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno theraṁ “etadaggaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:281_6: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dhammakathikānaṁ yadidaṁ puṇṇo”ti dhammakathikānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a11:281_7: So ekadivasaṁ attano vimuttisampattiṁ paccavekkhitvā “satthāraṁ nissāya ahañceva aññe ca bahū sattā saṁsāradukkhato vippamuttā,
atk-s0508a11:281_8: bahūpakārā vata sappurisasaṁsevā”ti pītisomanassajāto udānavasena pītivegavissaṭṭhaṁ “sabbhireva samāsethā”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:282_3: Te hi anavasesato asataṁ dhammaṁ pahāya saddhamme ukkaṁsagatattā sātisayaṁ pasaṁsiyattā ca visesato “santo sappurisā”ti ca vuccanti.
atk-s0508a11:282_5: Te payirupāsanto tesaṁ sussūsanto diṭṭhānugatiñca āpajjanto samānavāso bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a11:282_9: Tato eva attatthādibhedaṁ atthaṁ aviparītato passantīti atthadassino.
atk-s0508a11:282_13: te vā sammā sevantā ekantahitabhāvato maggañāṇādīheva araṇīyato atthaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:282_16: hīnacchandādīhi daṭṭhuṁ asakkuṇeyyattā itarehi ca kicchena daṭṭhabbattā duddasaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:282_22: dukkhena daṭṭhabbaṁ na sukhena daṭṭhuṁ sakkāti duddasaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:282_26: nirodhasaccanti evametaṁ catusaccaṁ dhīrā samadhigacchanti dhitisampannatāya dhīrā catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṁ ussukkāpetvā sammadeva adhigacchanti.
atk-s0508a11:282_31: Yasmā paṇḍitehi atthadassībhi samudāyabhūtehi dhīrā appamattā vicakkhaṇā mahantādivisesavantaṁ atthaṁ samadhigacchanti,
atk-s0508a11:285_2: Ayampi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva dhammadesanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:285_3: suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ senāsanapaññāpakānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā adhikārakammaṁ katvā
atk-s0508a11:285_4: taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthetvā satthārā byākato yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā devamanussesu saṁsaritvā kassapadasabalassa
atk-s0508a11:285_6: Tadā tena saddhiṁ apare cha janāti satta bhikkhū ekacittā hutvā aññe sāsane agāravaṁ karonte disvā –
atk-s0508a11:285_7: “idha kiṁ karoma ekamante samaṇadhammaṁ katvā dukkhassantaṁ karissāmā”ti nisseṇiṁ bandhitvā uccaṁ pabbatasikharaṁ āruhitvā,
atk-s0508a11:285_10: mā pacchānutappino ahuvatthā”ti vatvā sabbe ekacittā hutvā nisseṇiṁ pātetvā –
atk-s0508a11:285_12: āvuso”ti aññamaññaṁ ovaditvā cittarucikesu ṭhānesu nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṁ kātuṁ ārabhiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:286_0: Tatreko thero pañcame divase arahattaṁ patvā,
atk-s0508a11:286_2: ahaṁ imasmiṁ ṭhāne kiṁ karissāmi”ti iddhiyā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṁ āharitvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0508a11:286_10: tenābhataṁ sesā paribhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karissantī”’ti. “Natthi, āvuso”ti.
atk-s0508a11:286_14: Thero te saññāpetuṁ asakkonto phāsukaṭṭhāne piṇḍapātaṁ paribhuñjitvā gato.
atk-s0508a11:286_15: Aparo thero sattame divase anāgāmiphalaṁ patvā tato cuto suddhāvāsabrahmaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0508a11:286_16: Itare therā tato cutā ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ devamanussesu saṁsaritvā tesu tesu kulesu nibbattā.
atk-s0508a11:287_0: Ayaṁ pana dabbatthero mallaraṭṭhe anupiyanagare ekassa mallarañño gehe paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a11:287_2: matasarīraṁ susānaṁ netvā dārucitakaṁ āropetvā aggiṁ adaṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:287_4: Dārako attano puññabalena uppatitvā ekasmiṁ dabbatthambhe nipati.
atk-s0508a11:287_6: Sā tassa nāmaṁ gaṇhantī dabbatthambhe patitvā laddhajīvitattā “dabbo”tissa nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:287_7: Tassa ca sattavassikakāle satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro mallaraṭṭhe cārikaṁ caramāno anupiyambavane viharati.
atk-s0508a11:287_8: Dabbakumāro satthāraṁ disvā dassaneneva pasīditvā pabbajitukāmo hutvā “ahaṁ dasabalassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti ayyikaṁ āpucchi.
atk-s0508a11:287_10: tātā”ti dabbakumāraṁ ādāya satthu santikaṁ gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0508a11:287_14: So thero satthu vacanaṁ sutvā dabbakumāraṁ pabbājento tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṁ ācikkhi.
atk-s0508a11:287_15: Pubbahetusampanno katābhinīhāro satto paṭhamakesavaṭṭiyā voropanakkhaṇe sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi,
atk-s0508a11:287_18: sabbakesānaṁ pana oropanañca arahattaphalasacchikiriyā ca apacchā apure ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:287_19: Satthā mallaraṭṭhe yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā rājagahaṁ gantvā veḷuvane vāsaṁ kappesi.
atk-s0508a11:288_0: Tatrāyasmā dabbo mallaputto rahogato attano kiccanipphattiṁ oloketvā saṅghassa veyyāvaccakaraṇe kāyaṁ yojetukāmo cintesi –
atk-s0508a11:288_1: “yaṁnūnāhaṁ saṅghassa senāsanañca paññāpeyyaṁ bhattāni ca uddiseyya”nti.
atk-s0508a11:288_2: So satthu santikaṁ gantvā attano parivitakkaṁ ārocesi.
atk-s0508a11:288_3: Satthā tassa sādhukāraṁ datvā senāsanapaññāpakattañca bhattuddesakattañca sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0508a11:288_4: Atha naṁ “ayaṁ dabbo daharova samāno mahante ṭhāne ṭhito”ti sattavassikakāleyeva upasampādesi.
atk-s0508a11:288_5: Thero upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya rājagahaṁ upanissāya viharantānaṁ sabbabhikkhūnaṁ senāsanāni ca paññāpeti,
atk-s0508a11:288_8: “dabbo kira mallaputto sabhāgasabhāgānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ekaṭṭhāne senāsanāni paññāpeti,
atk-s0508a11:289_0: Atha naṁ bhikkhū kālepi vikālepi – “amhākaṁ, āvuso,
atk-s0508a11:289_2: amhākaṁ maddakucchismiṁ migadāye”ti evaṁ senāsanaṁ uddisāpetvā tassa iddhiṁ passantā gacchanti.
atk-s0508a11:289_3: Sopi iddhiyā manomaye kāye abhisaṅkharitvā ekekassa therassa ekekaṁ attanā sadisaṁ bhikkhuṁ datvā aṅguliyā
atk-s0508a11:289_4: jalamānāya purato gantvā “ayaṁ mañco idaṁ pīṭha”ntiādīni vatvā senāsanaṁ paññāpetvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0508a11:289_8: Satthā idameva kāraṇaṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ katvā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṁ senāsanapaññāpakānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi –
atk-s0508a11:289_11: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ senāsanapaññāpakānaṁ yadidaṁ dabbo mallaputto”ti.
atk-s0508a11:301_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:313_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:321_0: Sabbattha sukhito āsiṁ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
atk-s0508a11:329_0: Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṁ varo.
atk-s0508a11:335_0: Na suṇissāma saddhammaṁ, aho no appapuññatā.
atk-s0508a11:337_0: Sāgaro ca sasokova, vinadī karuṇaṁ giraṁ.
atk-s0508a11:341_0: Sadhūmā jālavaṭṭā ca, raviṁsu karuṇaṁ migā.
atk-s0508a11:343_0: Saṁviggā bhikkhavo satta, cintayimha mayaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a11:351_0: Tasmā payogo kattabbo, yāva ṭhāti mune mataṁ.
atk-s0508a11:355_0: Ahañca pakkusāti ca, sabhiyo bāhiyo tathā.
atk-s0508a11:359_0: Mātā matā citāruḷhā, tato nippatito ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:367_0: Jino tasmiṁ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṁ.
atk-s0508a11:371_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:373_0: Evaṁbhūtaṁ pana taṁ yena pubbe ekassa khīṇāsavattherassa anuddhaṁsanavasena katena pāpakammena bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye pacci,
atk-s0508a11:373_1: tāya eva kammapilotikāya codiyamānā mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū “iminā mayaṁ kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino
atk-s0508a11:373_2: antare paribheditā”ti duggahitagāhino amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:373_3: Tasmiñca adhikaraṇe saṅghena sativinayena vūpasamite ayaṁ thero lokānukampāya attano guṇe vibhāvento “yo duddamiyo”ti imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:374_3: Ubhayenapi aññaṁ viya katvā attānameva vadati.
atk-s0508a11:374_6: Idañca attano puthujjanakāle diṭṭhigatānaṁ visūkāyikānaṁ kilesānaṁ madālepacittassa vipphanditaṁ indriyānaṁ avūpasamanañca cintetvā vadati.
atk-s0508a11:374_8: tena hi danto puna dametabbatābhāvato “danto”ti vattabbataṁ arahati,
atk-s0508a11:374_10: Atha vā damenāti damakena purisadammasārathinā damito.
atk-s0508a11:374_13: Tenāha bhagavā imameva theraṁ sandhāya – “na kho, dabba,
atk-s0508a11:374_15: Santusitoti yathāladdhapaccayasantosena jhānasamāpattisantosena maggaphalasantosena ca santuṭṭho.
atk-s0508a11:374_16: Vitiṇṇakaṅkhoti soḷasavatthukāya aṭṭhavatthukāya ca kaṅkhāya paṭhamamaggeneva samugghāṭitattā vigatakaṅkho.
atk-s0508a11:374_17: Vijitāvīti purisājānīyena vijetabbassa sabbassapi saṁkilesapakkhassa vijitattā vidhamitattā vijitāvī.
atk-s0508a11:374_18: Apetabheravoti pañcavīsatiyā bhayānaṁ sabbaso apetattā apagatabheravo abhayūparato.
atk-s0508a11:374_25: tasmā pahātabbadhammānaṁ maggena sabbaso pahīnattā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbutoti attho.
atk-s0508a11:374_26: Ṭhitattoti ṭhitasabhāvo acalo iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattiyā lokadhammehi akampanīyo.
atk-s0508a11:374_28: tena yo pubbe duddamo hutvā ṭhito yasmā dabbattā satthārā uttamena damena damito santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho vijitāvī apetabheravo,
atk-s0508a11:374_29: tasmā so dabbo parinibbuto tatoyeva ca ṭhitatto,
atk-s0508a11:374_31: na pasādaññathattanti paraneyyabuddhike satte anukampanto thero aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a11:377_2: Ito kira aṭṭhārasādhikassa kappasatassa matthake atthadassī nāma sambuddho loke uppajjitvā sadevakaṁ
atk-s0508a11:377_3: lokaṁ saṁsāramahoghato tārento ekadivasaṁ mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ gaṅgātīraṁ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a11:377_4: Tasmiṁ kāle ayaṁ gahapatikule nibbatto tattha bhagavantaṁ passitvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “kiṁ, bhante,
atk-s0508a11:377_8: Satthā taṁ anukampanto saha bhikkhusaṅghena nāvaṁ abhiruhi.
atk-s0508a11:377_9: So sayampi abhiruyha sukheneva paratīraṁ sampāpetvā bhagavantaṁ bhikkhusaṅghañca dutiyadivase mahādānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:377_11: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaritvā ito terasādhikakappasatassa matthake khattiyakule nibbattitvā rājā ahosi cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā.
atk-s0508a11:377_12: So satte sugatimagge patiṭṭhāpetvā tato cuto ekanavutikappe vipassissa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā dhutadhamme
atk-s0508a11:377_14: Puna kassapassa bhagavato kālepi tassa sāsane tīhi sahāyehi saddhiṁ pabbajitvā vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:377_15: katvā ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ devamanussesu saṁsaritvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto
atk-s0508a11:377_19: Bhūmijo jeyyaseno abhirādhanoti tīhi sahāyehi saddhiṁ bhagavato santikaṁ gato dhammadesanaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji.
atk-s0508a11:380_0: Atha sambhūto bhagavato santike kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā nibaddhaṁ sītavane vasati.
atk-s0508a11:380_2: Tena ca samayena vessavaṇo mahārājā kenacideva karaṇīyena jambudīpe dakkhiṇadisābhāgaṁ uddissa ākāsena
atk-s0508a11:380_3: gacchanto theraṁ abbhokāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontaṁ disvā vimānato oruyha theraṁ vanditvā,
atk-s0508a11:380_6: ārakkhañcassa karothā”ti dve yakkhe āṇāpetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a11:380_7: Te therassa samīpe ṭhatvā manasikāraṁ paṭisaṁharitvā nisinnakāle ārocesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:380_8: Taṁ sutvā thero “tumhe mama vacanena vessavaṇamahārājassa kathetha,
atk-s0508a11:380_9: bhagavatā attano sāsane ṭhitānaṁ satiārakkhā nāma ṭhapitā atthi,
atk-s0508a11:380_12: bhagavato ovāde ṭhitānaṁ edisāya ārakkhāya karaṇīyaṁ natthī”ti te vissajjetvā tāvadeva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā vijjāttayaṁ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a11:380_13: Tato vessavaṇo nivattamāno therassa samīpaṁ patvā mukhākārasallakkhaṇenevassa katakiccabhāvaṁ ñatvā sāvatthiṁ
atk-s0508a11:380_14: gantvā bhagavato ārocetvā satthu sammukhā theraṁ abhitthavanto –
atk-s0508a11:383_0: Imāya gāthāya therassa guṇe vaṇṇesi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a11:392_0: “Pacchime ca bhave asmiṁ, jātohaṁ brāhmaṇe kule;
atk-s0508a11:393_0: Saddhiṁ tīhi sahāyehi, pabbajiṁ satthu sāsane.
atk-s0508a11:395_0: Athāyasmā sambhūto bhagavantaṁ dassanāya gacchante bhikkhū disvā “āvuso,
atk-s0508a11:395_1: mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha,
atk-s0508a11:395_2: evañca vadethā”ti vatvā dhammādhikaraṇaṁ attano satthu aviheṭhitabhāvaṁ pakāsento “yo sītavana”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a11:395_3: Te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā sambhūtattherassa sāsanaṁ sampavedentā, “āyasmā, bhante,
atk-s0508a11:395_5: evañca vadatī”ti vatvā taṁ gāthaṁ ārocesuṁ,
atk-s0508a11:396_1: Yaṁ pana te bhikkhū sambhūtattherena vuttaṁ “yo sītavana”nti gāthaṁ satthu nivedesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:396_2: Tattha sītavananti evaṁnāmakaṁ rājagahasamīpe mahantaṁ bheravasusānavanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:396_4: Etena bhagavatā anuññātaṁ pabbajitānurūpaṁ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a11:396_5: Bhikkhūti saṁsārabhayassa ikkhanato bhinnakilesatāya ca bhikkhu.
atk-s0508a11:396_12: Vijitāvīti sāsane sammāpaṭipajjantena vijetabbaṁ kilesagaṇaṁ vijitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0508a11:396_22: so bhikkhu vivekasukhānupekkhāya eko sītavanaṁ upāgami,
atk-s0508a11:396_23: upāgato ca lolabhāvābhāvato santuṭṭho dhitimā kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṁ bhāvento tathādhigataṁ jhānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:396_24: pādakaṁ katvā āraddhavipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā adhigatena aggamaggena samāhito vijitāvī ca hutvā katakiccatāya
atk-s0508a11:399_2: Ayaṁ kira ito ekatiṁse kappe anuppanne buddhe sumanassa nāma paccekabuddhassa pasannacitto phalāphalaṁ
atk-s0508a11:399_3: datvā sugatīsu eva saṁsaranto sikhissa sammāsambuddhassa kāle aruṇavatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto “sikhissa
atk-s0508a11:399_5: ojitā nāma dve satthavāhaputtā paṭhamāhāraṁ adaṁsū”ti sutvā attano sahāyakena saddhiṁ bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a11:399_6: vanditvā svātanāya nimantetvā mahādānaṁ pavattetvā patthanaṁ akaṁsu –
atk-s0508a11:399_9: Te tattha tattha bhave puññakammaṁ katvā devamanussesu saṁsarantā kassapassa bhagavato kāle gopālakaseṭṭhissa puttā bhātaro hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0508a11:399_11: Amhākaṁ pana bhagavato kāle pokkharavatīnagare satthavāhassa puttā bhātaro hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0508a11:399_14: te pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni bhaṇḍassa pūretvā vāṇijjāya gacchantā bhagavati paṭhamābhisambuddhe sattasattāhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:399_15: vimuttisukhadhammapaccavekkhaṇāhi vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe rājāyatanamūle viharante rājāyatanassa
atk-s0508a11:399_17: tesaṁ tasmiṁ samaye samepi bhūmibhāge akaddamodake sakaṭāni nappavattiṁsu, “kiṁ nu, kho,
atk-s0508a11:399_18: kāraṇa”nti ca cintentānaṁ porāṇasālohitā devatā rukkhaviṭapantare attānaṁ dassentī āha – “mādisā,
atk-s0508a11:399_19: ayaṁ bhagavā acirābhisambuddho sattasattāhaṁ anāhāro vimuttisukhāpaṭisaṁvedī idāni rājāyatanamūle nisinno,
atk-s0508a11:399_22: Taṁ sutvā te uḷāraṁ pītisomanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedentā,
atk-s0508a11:399_23: “āhārasampādanaṁ papañca”nti maññamānā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca bhagavato datvā dvevācikasaraṇaṁ gantvā kesadhātuyo labhitvā agamaṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:399_25: Atha bhagavati bārāṇasiṁ gantvā dhammacakkaṁ pavattetvā anupubbena rājagahe viharante taphussabhalliyā
atk-s0508a11:399_26: rājagahaṁ upagatā bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:399_28: Tesu taphusso sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya upāsakova ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:402_0: “Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a11:405_0: Athekadivasaṁ māro bhalliyattherassa bhiṁsāpanatthaṁ bhayānakaṁ rūpaṁ dassesi.
atk-s0508a11:406_1: Tattha yopānudīti yo apānudi khipi pajahi viddhaṁsesi.
atk-s0508a11:406_2: Maccurājassāti maccu nāma maraṇaṁ khandhānaṁ bhedo,
atk-s0508a11:406_3: so eva ca sattānaṁ attano vase anuvattāpanato issaraṭṭhena rājāti maccurājā, tassa.
atk-s0508a11:406_5: sā hissa vasavattane aṅgabhāvato senā nāma,
atk-s0508a11:406_6: tena hesa mahatā nānāvidhena vipulena “mahāseno”ti vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0508a11:406_9: Atha vā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena “maccū”ti idha devaputtamāro adhippeto,
atk-s0508a11:407_0: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
atk-s0508a11:408_0: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
atk-s0508a11:410_0: Sattamī vicikicchā te, māno makkho ca aṭṭhamī”ti. ;
atk-s0508a11:411_0: Naḷasetuṁvasudubbalaṁ mahoghoti sāravirahitato naḷasetusadisaṁ ativiya abalabhāvato suṭṭhu dubbalaṁ saṁkilesasenaṁ
atk-s0508a11:411_1: navalokuttaradhammānaṁ mahābalavabhāvato mahoghasadisena aggamaggena yo apānudi vijitāvī apetabheravo danto,
atk-s0508a11:411_3: Taṁ sutvā māro “jānāti maṁ samaṇo”ti tatthevantaradhāyīti.
atk-s0508a11:414_2: Ayaṁ kira ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato vasanaāvāsaṁ paṭijaggi.
atk-s0508a11:414_3: Ekadivasañca sindhuvārapupphasadisāni nigguṇṭhipupphāni gahetvā bhagavantaṁ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a11:414_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto ito pañcatiṁse kappe khattiyakule nibbattitvā mahāpatāpo nāma rājā ahosi cakkavattī.
atk-s0508a11:414_5: So dhammena samena rajjaṁ kārento satte saggamagge patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a11:414_6: Puna imasmiṁ kappe kassapassa bhagavato kāle mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṁ dānaṁ dento saṅghassa khīrabhattaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:414_7: Evaṁ tattha tattha dānamayaṁ puññasambhāraṁ karonto itarañca nibbānatthaṁ sambharanto devamanussesu saṁsaritvā
atk-s0508a11:414_8: imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare rañño pasenadissa amaccakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:414_10: So vayappatto nāmānugatehi pattabalajavādiguṇehi samannāgato saṅgāmasūro hutvā mātāpitūhi nibandhavasena
atk-s0508a11:414_11: kārite dārapariggahe ekaṁyeva puttaṁ labhitvā pubbahetunā codiyamāno kāmesu saṁsāre ca ādīnavaṁ disvā
atk-s0508a11:414_12: saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:422_0: Evaṁ pana arahattaṁ patvā phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmentaṁ theraṁ purāṇadutiyikā uppabbājetukāmā antarantarā
atk-s0508a11:422_1: nānānayehi palobhetuṁ parakkamantī ekadivasaṁ divāvihāraṭṭhānaṁ gantvā itthikuttādīni dassetuṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a11:422_2: Athāyasmā vīro “maṁ palobhetukāmā sineruṁ makasapakkhavātena cāletukāmā viya yāva bālā vatāyaṁ itthī”ti
atk-s0508a11:422_3: tassā kiriyāya niratthakabhāvaṁ dīpento “yo duddamiyo”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:423_1: Tattha yo duddamiyotiādīnaṁ padānaṁ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0508a11:423_2: Idaṁ panettha yojanāmattaṁ yo pubbe adanta kilesatāya paccatthikehi vā saṅgamasīse dametuṁ jetuṁ asakkuṇeyyatāyaduddamiyo,
atk-s0508a11:423_3: idāni pana uttamena damena danto catubbidhasammappamadhānavīriyasampattiyā vīro,
atk-s0508a11:423_4: vuttanayeneva santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho vijitāvī apetalomahaṁso vīro vīranāmako anavasesato kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto,
atk-s0508a11:423_8: “mayhaṁ sāmike evaṁ paṭipanne ko mayhaṁ gharāvāsena attho”ti saṁvegajātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitvā nacirasseva tevijjā ahosīti.
atk-s0508a11:426_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṁsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva satthu santike
atk-s0508a11:426_3: dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ devatānaṁ piyamanāpabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ
atk-s0508a11:426_4: patthetvā yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṁsaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle manussaloke
atk-s0508a11:426_5: nibbattitvā bhagavati parinibbute satthu thūpassa pūjaṁ katvā saṅghe ca mahādānaṁ pavattetvā tato cuto
atk-s0508a11:426_6: devamanussesu eva saṁsaranto anuppanne buddhe cakkavattī rājā hutvā mahājanaṁ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0508a11:426_8: So anuppanneyeva amhākaṁ bhagavati sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇagehe nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:426_12: Saṁsāre pana saṁvegabahulatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā cūḷagandhāraṁ nāma vijjaṁ sādhetvā tāya
atk-s0508a11:426_13: vijjāya ākāsacārī paracittavidū ca hutvā rājagahe lābhaggayasaggappatto paṭivasati.
atk-s0508a11:427_0: Atha yadā amhākaṁ bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā anukkamena rājagahaṁ upagato,
atk-s0508a11:427_1: tato paṭṭhāya buddhānubhāvena tassa sā vijjā na sampajjati,
atk-s0508a11:427_4: “sutaṁ kho pana metaṁ ācariyapācariyānaṁ bhāsamānānaṁ ‘yattha mahāgandhāravijjā dharati,
atk-s0508a11:427_6: samaṇassa pana gotamassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāya nāyaṁ mama vijjā sampajjati,
atk-s0508a11:427_8: yaṁnūnāhaṁ taṁ payirupāsitvā tassa santike taṁ vijjaṁ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0508a11:427_15: Tassa bhagavā dhammaṁ kathetvā caritānukūlaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:427_16: So upanissayasampannatāya nacirasseva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:427_17: Yā pana purimajātiyaṁ tassovāde ṭhatvā sagge nibbattā devatā,
atk-s0508a11:427_18: taṁ kataññutaṁ nissāya sañjātabahumānā sāyaṁ pātaṁ theraṁ payirupāsitvā gacchanti.
atk-s0508a11:427_19: Tasmā thero devatānaṁ piyamanāpatāya aggataṁ patto.
atk-s0508a11:433_0: Sumedho nāma nāmena, anumodittha so tadā.
atk-s0508a11:440_0: “Na te bījaṁ pavappanti, napi nīyanti naṅgalā;
atk-s0508a11:444_0: “Na maṁ mittā amittā vā, hiṁsanti sabbapāṇino;
atk-s0508a11:453_0: Tathā devatāhi ativiya piyāyitabbabhāvato imaṁ theraṁ bhagavā devatānaṁ piyamanāpabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi –
atk-s0508a11:453_3: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ devatānaṁ piyamanāpānaṁ yadidaṁ pilindavaccho”ti so ekadivasaṁ bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe
atk-s0508a11:453_4: nisinno attano guṇe paccavekkhitvā tesaṁ kāraṇabhūtaṁ vijjānimittaṁ bhagavato santike āgamanaṁ pasaṁsanto
atk-s0508a11:454_5: Nāpagatanti na apagataṁ hitābhivuddhito na apetaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:454_6: Nayidaṁ dumantitaṁ mamāti idaṁ mama duṭṭhu kathitaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:454_13: Yaṁ “bhagavato santike dhammaṁ sutvā pabbajissāmī”ti mama mantitaṁ gaditaṁ kathitaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:454_14: cittena vā vīmaṁsitaṁ idampi na dummantinti.
atk-s0508a11:454_20: Yaṁ seṭṭhaṁ tadupāgaminti yaṁ tattha seṭṭhaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:454_24: Sammāsambuddhehi eva vā kusalādivasena khandhādivasena yathāsabhāvato saṁvibhattesu sabhāvadhammesu yaṁ tattha seṭṭhaṁ uttamaṁ pavaraṁ,
atk-s0508a11:454_27: tasmā svāgataṁ mama na apagataṁ sumantitaṁ na dummantitanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a11:457_2: So kira vipassissa bhagavato kāle cakkavākayoniyaṁ nibbatto bhagavantaṁ gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:457_3: attano mukhatuṇḍakena sālapupphaṁ gahetvā pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:457_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto ito sattarase kappe aṭṭhakkhattuṁ cakkavattī rājā ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:457_5: Imasmiṁ pana kappe kassapassa bhagavato sāsane osakkamāne kuṭumbiyakule nibbattitvā pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:457_6: katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare samiddhissa nāma brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0508a11:457_8: Tassa jātadivase tasmiṁ gehe sabbā rittakumbhiyo suvaṇṇamāsānaṁ puṇṇā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:457_10: So vayappatto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ patvā vivāhakammaṁ katvā ekaṁ puttaṁ labhitvā upanissayasampannatāya
atk-s0508a11:457_11: gharāvāsaṁ jigucchanto bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado
atk-s0508a11:457_12: pubbakiccasampanno catusaccakammaṭṭhāne yuttappayutto vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:463_0: Tena cittappasādena, duggatiṁ so na gacchati.
atk-s0508a11:471_0: Athassa purāṇadutiyikā taṁ palobhetukāmā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā puttena saddhiṁ upagantvā piyālāpabhāvādikehi bhāvavivaraṇakammaṁ nāma kātuṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a11:471_1: Thero tassā kāraṇaṁ disvā attano katthacipi alaggabhāvaṁ pakāsento “vihari apekkha”nti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:472_1: Tattha viharīti visesato hari apahari apanesi.
atk-s0508a11:472_7: saddo samuccayattho “apadā vā dvipadā vā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0508a11:472_9: Vedagūti vedena gato maggañāṇena nibbānaṁ gato adhigato,
atk-s0508a11:472_13: Sabbesu dhammesu anūpalittoti sabbesu ārammaṇesu dhammesu taṇhādiṭṭhilepavasena na upalitto,
atk-s0508a11:472_21: yo sakalassa khandhādilokassa samapaññāsāya ākārehi udayabbayaṁ jānitvā vedagū yatatto katthaci anupalitto,
atk-s0508a11:472_22: so sabbattha apekkhaṁ vineyya santusito tādisānaṁ vippakārānaṁ na kiñci maññati,
atk-s0508a11:472_24: Atha sā itthī “ayaṁ samaṇo mayi putte ca nirapekkho,
atk-s0508a11:478_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā paresaṁ bhatiyā jīvikaṁ kappento bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:478_3: sāvakaṁ sujātaṁ nāma theraṁ paṁsukūlaṁ pariyesantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vatthaṁ datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi.
atk-s0508a11:478_4: So tena puññakammena tettiṁsakkhattuṁ devarajjaṁ kāresi.
atk-s0508a11:478_7: Evaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane osakkamāne pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ katvā ekaṁ
atk-s0508a11:478_8: buddhantaraṁ devamanussagatīsu aparāparaṁ parivattanto amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle kosambiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:478_10: So vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṁ gato buddhaguṇe sutvā pasannamānaso bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkami,
atk-s0508a11:478_12: So paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado katapubbakicco caritānukūlaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā bhāvento vihari.
atk-s0508a11:478_13: Tena ca samayena kosambikā bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:478_14: Tadā cūḷavacchatthero ubhayesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ laddhiṁ anādāya bhagavatā dinnovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṁ brūhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:494_0: Atha cūḷavacchatthero arahattaṁ patvā tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kalahābhiratiyā sakatthavināsaṁ disvā dhammasaṁvegappatto,
atk-s0508a11:494_1: attano ca pattavisesaṁ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassavasena “pāmojjabahulo”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:495_1: Tattha pāmojjabahuloti suparisuddhasīlatāya vippaṭisārābhāvato adhikusalesu dhammesu abhirativasena pamodabahulo.
atk-s0508a11:495_5: So hi sabbaññubuddhena sāmukkaṁsikāya desanāya pakāsitattā sātisayaṁ buddhappavedito nāma.
atk-s0508a11:495_6: Tassa pana adhigamūpāyabhāvato desanādhammopi idha labbhateva.
atk-s0508a11:495_8: Evarūpo hi bhikkhu santaṁ padaṁ santaṁ koṭṭhāsaṁ sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ upasamabhāvato saṅkhārūpasamaṁ paramasukhatāya
atk-s0508a11:495_10: Parisuddhasīlo hi bhikkhu vippaṭisārābhāvena pāmojjabahulo saddhamme yuttappayutto vimuttipariyosānā sabbasampattiyo pāpuṇāti. Yathāha –
atk-s0508a11:495_17: Tattha pana so pamodabahulo kiṁ vā karotīti āha “dhamme buddhappavedite”tiādi.
atk-s0508a11:495_19: sambhavato sampattiyo hatthagatā eva honti, yathāha –
atk-s0508a11:498_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pānīyadānamadāsi.
atk-s0508a11:498_3: Puna sikhissa bhagavato kāle upāsako hutvā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ bahuṁ puññakammaṁ akāsi,
atk-s0508a11:498_4: so tehi puññakammehi tattha tattha sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nāḷakagāme
atk-s0508a11:498_5: samiddhissa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:498_7: So vayappatto āyasmato sāriputtassa bhagavato sāvakabhāvaṁ sutvā “sopi nāma mahāpañño.
atk-s0508a11:498_9: so eva maññe imasmiṁ loke aggapuggalo”ti bhagavati saddhaṁ uppādetvā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:507_0: Evaṁ pana arahattaṁ patvā vimuttisukhaṁ anubhavanto sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvavibhāvanena sabrahmacārīnaṁ ussāhajananatthaṁ “paññābalī”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:508_1: Tattha paññābalīti pārihāriyapaññāya vipassanāpaññāya ca vasena abhiṇhaso sātisayena paññābalena samannāgato.
atk-s0508a11:508_5: Jhānaratoti tato eva ārammaṇūpanijjhāne lakkhaṇūpanijjhāne ca rato satatābhiyutto.
atk-s0508a11:508_9: Yathā paccaye paribhuñjantassa paribhuñjanaṁ atthiyaṁ hoti,
atk-s0508a11:508_11: Sāmiparibhogena hi taṁ atthiyaṁ hoti dāyajjaparibhogena vā,
atk-s0508a11:508_12: na aññathā bhojananti ca nidassanamattaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:508_19: Tasmā anupādāparinibbānatthaṁ bhojanapaccaye bhuñjamāno tato eva kaṅkhetha kālaṁ attano anupādāparinibbānakālaṁ āgameyya.
atk-s0508a11:508_21: Bāhirakassa pana kāmesu vītarāgassa idaṁ natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:511_2: So kira atthadassino bhagavato kāle kacchapayoniyaṁ nibbatto vinatāya nāma nadiyā vasati.
atk-s0508a11:511_4: So kira ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ nadiyā tīre ṭhitaṁ disvā,
atk-s0508a11:511_5: “pāraṁ gantukāmo maññe bhagavā”ti attano piṭṭhiyaṁ āropetvā netukāmo pādamūle nipajji.
atk-s0508a11:511_6: Bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayaṁ ñatvā taṁ anukampanto āruhi.
atk-s0508a11:511_7: So pītisomanassajāto sotaṁ chindanto jiyāya vegena khittasaro viya tāvadeva paratīraṁ pāpesi.
atk-s0508a11:511_8: Bhagavā tassa puññassa phalaṁ etarahi nibbattanakasampattiñca byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a11:511_9: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto anekasatakkhattuṁ tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññavāsīyeva ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:511_10: Puna kassapabuddhakāle kapotayoniyaṁ nibbattitvā araññe viharantaṁ mettāvihāriṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ disvā cittaṁ pasādesi.
atk-s0508a11:512_0: Tato pana cuto bārāṇasiyaṁ kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ bahuṁ puññakammaṁ upacini.
atk-s0508a11:512_1: Evaṁ tattha tattha devamanussesu saṁsaritvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare vacchagottassa nāma brāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a11:512_2: Tassa mātā paripakkagabbhā araññaṁ dassanatthāya sañjātadohaḷā araññaṁ pavisitvā vicarati,
atk-s0508a11:512_9: Aparabhāge mahāsatte mahābhinikkhamanaṁ nikkhamitvā mahāpadhānaṁ padahante,
atk-s0508a11:512_10: “ahampi siddhatthakumārena saha araññe viharissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā himavante
atk-s0508a11:512_11: vasanto abhisambuddhabhāvaṁ sutvā bhagavato santikaṁ upagantvā pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā araññe
atk-s0508a11:512_12: vasamāno nacirasseva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a11:522_0: Sukhaṁ me tādisaṁ natthi, phuṭṭhe pādatale yathā.
atk-s0508a11:526_0: Ayañca kacchapo rājā, tāresi mama paññavā.
atk-s0508a11:540_0: Evaṁ pana arahattaṁ patvā bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṁ viharante tattha gantvā satthāraṁ vanditvā bhikkhūhi samāgato paṭisanthāravasena “kiṁ, āvuso,
atk-s0508a11:540_2: araññe pabbatā”ti attanā vuṭṭhapabbate vaṇṇento “nīlabbhavaṇṇā”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:541_4: Sucindharāti sucisuddhabhūmibhāgatāya suddhacittānaṁ vā ariyānaṁ nivāsanaṭṭhānatāya sucindharā.
atk-s0508a11:541_8: Indagopakasañchannāti indagopakanāmakehi pavāḷavaṇṇehi rattakimīhi sañchāditā pāvussakālavasena evamāha.
atk-s0508a11:541_16: Evaṁ thero attano cirakālaparibhāvitaṁ araññābhiratiṁ pavedento tividhaṁ vivekābhiratimeva dīpeti.
atk-s0508a11:544_2: So kira ito ekatiṁse kappe vessabhussa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto ekadivasaṁ kenacideva karaṇīyena
atk-s0508a11:544_3: araññaṁ paviṭṭho tattha pabbatantare nisinnaṁ vessabhuṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannacitto upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a11:544_5: Puna tattha manoharāni kāsumārikaphalāni disvā tāni gahetvā bhagavato upanesi,
atk-s0508a11:544_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane mātule pabbajante tena saddhiṁ
atk-s0508a11:544_8: pabbajitvā bahuṁ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde vanavacchattherassa bhāgineyyo
atk-s0508a11:544_11: Tassa mātā attano jeṭṭhabhātike vanavacche sāsane pabbajitvā pabbajitakiccaṁ matthakaṁ pāpetvā araññe viharante taṁ pavattiṁ sutvā puttaṁ āha –
atk-s0508a11:544_15: So mātu ekavacaneneva ca pubbe katādhikāratāya ca mātulattherassa santikaṁ gantvā pabbajitvā taṁ upaṭṭhahanto araññe vasati.
atk-s0508a11:545_0: Tassa ekadivasaṁ kenacideva karaṇīyena gāmantaṁ gatassa kharo ābādho uppajji.
atk-s0508a11:545_3: kiṁ nu kho kāraṇa”nti tattha gantvā taṁ gilānaṁ disvā tassa taṁ taṁ kattabbayuttakaṁ karonto divasabhāgaṁ
atk-s0508a11:545_5: na mayā pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya gāme vasitapubbaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:545_11: taṁ sutvā thero taṁ bāhāyaṁ gahetvā araññameva netvā ovādaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:545_12: So therassa ovāde ṭhatvā vipassitvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:550_0: “Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a11:553_0: So arahattaṁ patvā upajjhāyena attanā ca vuttamatthaṁ saṁsanditvā attano vivekābhiratikataṁ katakiccatañca
atk-s0508a11:554_1: Tattha upajjhāyoti vajjāvajjaṁ upanijjhāyati hitesitaṁ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ñāṇacakkhunā pekkhatīti upajjhāyo.
atk-s0508a11:554_7: Evaṁ pana upajjhāyena vutto sivako bhadro assājānīyo viya kasābhihato sañjātasaṁvego hutvā araññameva gantukāmataṁ pavedento –
atk-s0508a11:555_0: “Gāme me vasati kāyo, araññaṁ me gataṁ mano;
atk-s0508a11:557_1: yasmā idāni yadipi me idaṁ sarīraṁ gāmante ṭhitaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:557_3: tasmā semānakopi gacchāmi gelaññena ṭhānanisajjāgamanesu asamatthatāya sayānopi iminā sayitākārena sarīsapo viya sarīsapanto, etha, bhante,
atk-s0508a11:557_6: yasmā dhammasabhāvā kāmesu saṁsāre ca ādīnavaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:557_7: nekkhamme nibbāne ca ānisaṁsaṁ yāthāvato jānantassa na katthaci saṅgo,
atk-s0508a11:560_0: Pañcachinde pañca jaheti āyasmato kuṇḍadhānattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:560_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe uppanno vayappatto heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0508a11:560_3: bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ suṇanto satthārā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ paṭhamaṁ salākaṁ gaṇhantānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a11:560_4: ṭhapiyamānaṁ disvā taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthetvā tadanurūpaṁ puññaṁ karonto vicari.
atk-s0508a11:560_5: So ekadivasaṁ padumuttarassa bhagavato nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya nisinnassa manosilācuṇṇapiñjaraṁ mahantaṁ kadaliphalakaṇṇikaṁ upanesi,
atk-s0508a11:560_7: So tena puññakammena ekādasakkhattuṁ devesu devarajjaṁ kāresi.
atk-s0508a11:560_9: Evaṁ so punappunaṁ puññāni katvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto kassapabuddhakāle bhummadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:560_10: Dīghāyukabuddhānañca nāma na anvaddhamāsiko uposatho hoti.
atk-s0508a11:560_11: Tathā hi vipassissa bhagavato chabbassantare chabbassantare uposatho ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:560_12: Kassapadasabalo pana chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe māse pātimokkhaṁ osāresi.
atk-s0508a11:560_13: Tassa pātimokkhassa osāraṇakāle disāvāsikā dve sahāyakā bhikkhū “uposathaṁ karissāmā”ti gacchanti.
atk-s0508a11:561_5: sā tesaṁ okāsaṁ olokayamānā tesaṁ avidūreneva gacchati.
atk-s0508a11:561_6: Atheko thero ekassa hatthe pattacīvaraṁ datvā sarīravaḷañjanatthaṁ udakaphāsukaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā dhotahatthapādo
atk-s0508a11:561_7: hutvā gumbasamīpato nikkhamati bhummadevatā tassa therassa pacchato uttamarūpā itthī hutvā kese vidhunitvā
atk-s0508a11:561_8: saṁvidhāya sambandhantī viya piṭṭhiyaṁ paṁsuṁ puñchamānā viya sāṭakaṁ saṁvidhāya nivāsayamānā viya ca
atk-s0508a11:561_9: hutvā therassa padānupadikā hutvā gumbato nikkhantā.
atk-s0508a11:561_10: Ekamante ṭhito sahāyakatthero taṁ kāraṇaṁ disvāva domanassajāto “naṭṭho dāni me iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṁ dīgharattānugato sineho,
atk-s0508a11:561_12: ettakaṁ addhānaṁ iminā saddhiṁ vissāsaṁ na kareyya”nti cintetvā āgacchantassevassa,
atk-s0508a11:561_15: tādisena pāpena saddhiṁ ekamaggaṁ nāgacchāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a11:561_16: Taṁ kathaṁ sutvā tassa lajjibhikkhuno hadayaṁ tikhiṇasattiṁ gahetvā viddhaṁ viya ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:561_19: ahaṁ ettakaṁ kālaṁ dukkaṭamattampi āpattiṁ na jānāmi.
atk-s0508a11:561_23: kiṁ tvaṁ evaṁvidhena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena mātugāmena saddhiṁ ekaṭṭhāne hutvā nikkhanto”ti.
atk-s0508a11:561_26: Tassa yāvatatiyaṁ kathentassāpi itaro thero kathaṁ asaddahitvā attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṁyeva bhūtattaṁ katvā
atk-s0508a11:561_27: gaṇhanto tena saddhiṁ ekamaggena agantvā aññena maggena satthu santikaṁ gato.
atk-s0508a11:561_28: Itaropi bhikkhu aññena maggena satthu santikaṁyeva gato.
atk-s0508a11:562_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa uposathāgāraṁ pavisanavelāya so bhikkhu taṁ bhikkhuṁ uposathagge sañjānitvā,
atk-s0508a11:562_2: nāhaṁ tena saddhiṁ uposathaṁ karissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:562_3: Atha bhummadevatā “bhāriyaṁ mayā kammaṁ kata”nti mahallakaupāsakavaṇṇena tassa santikaṁ gantvā “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0508a11:562_6: ‘nāhaṁ tena saddhiṁ uposathaṁ karomī’ti bahi ṭhitomhī”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0508a11:562_10: mayā tumhākaṁ vīmaṁsanatthāya ‘daḷhā nu kho imesaṁ therānaṁ metti,
atk-s0508a11:562_11: no daḷhā’ti bhijjanābhijjanabhāvaṁ olokentena taṁ kammaṁ kata”nti. “Ko pana,
atk-s0508a11:562_14: bhante”ti devaputto kathento dibbānubhāvena ṭhatvā therassa pādesu nipatitvā “mayhaṁ, bhante, khamatha,
atk-s0508a11:562_16: uposathaṁ karothā”ti theraṁ yācitvā uposathaggaṁ pavesesi.
atk-s0508a11:562_17: So thero uposathaṁ tāva ekaṭṭhāne akāsi,
atk-s0508a11:562_18: mittasanthavavasena pana puna tena saddhiṁ na ekaṭṭhāne ahosīti.
atk-s0508a11:562_20: cuditakatthero pana aparāparaṁ vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:563_0: Bhummadevatā tassa kammassa nissandena ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ apāyabhayato na muccittha.
atk-s0508a11:563_1: Sace pana kismiñci kāle manussattaṁ āgacchati,
atk-s0508a11:563_2: aññena yena kenaci kato doso tasseva upari patati.
atk-s0508a11:563_3: So amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:563_5: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā mahallakakāle satthu dhammadesanaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji,
atk-s0508a11:563_6: tassa upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya ekā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā itthī tasmiṁ gāmaṁ pavisante saddhiṁyeva gāmaṁ pavisati,
atk-s0508a11:563_11: Tassa puna purimakammanissandena sā aññesaṁ upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0508a11:563_14: eko imissā amhākaṁ sahāyikāyā”ti parihāsaṁ karonti.
atk-s0508a11:563_16: Vihāragatampi naṁ sāmaṇerā ceva daharā bhikkhū ca parivāretvā “dhāno koṇḍo jāto”ti parihāsaṁ karonti.
atk-s0508a11:563_17: Athassa teneva kāraṇena kuṇḍadhānattheroti nāmaṁ jātaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:563_18: So uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya tehi kariyamānaṁ keḷiṁ sahituṁ asakkonto ummādaṁ gahetvā “tumhe koṇḍā,
atk-s0508a11:563_23: Satthā taṁ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, dhāna,
atk-s0508a11:563_24: sāmaṇerehi saddhiṁ pharusavācaṁ vadasī”ti vatvā tena “saccaṁ bhagavā”ti vutte “kasmā evaṁ vadesī”ti āha. “Bhante,
atk-s0508a11:563_26: “Tvaṁ pubbe katakammaṁ yāvajjadivasā jīrāpetuṁ na sakkosi,
atk-s0508a11:563_27: puna evarūpaṁ pharusaṁ māvadī bhikkhū”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0508a11:565_0: Dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṁ.
atk-s0508a11:567_0: Esa pattosi nibbānaṁ, sārambho te na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0508a11:568_0: Imañca pana tassa therassa mātugāmena saddhiṁ vicaraṇabhāvaṁ kosalaraññopi kathayiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:568_2: vīmaṁsathā”ti pesetvā sayampi mandeneva parivārena therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā ekamante olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:568_3: Tasmiṁ khaṇe thero sūcikammaṁ karonto nisinno hoti,
atk-s0508a11:568_4: sāpi itthī avidūre ṭhāne ṭhitā viya paññāyati.
atk-s0508a11:568_5: Rājā disvā “atthidaṁ kāraṇa”nti tassā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṁ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a11:568_6: Sā tasmiṁ āgacchante therassa vasanapaṇṇasālaṁ paviṭṭhā viya ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:568_7: Rājāpi tāya saddhiṁ tameva paṇṇasālaṁ pavisitvā sabbattha olokento adisvā “nāyaṁ mātugāmo,
atk-s0508a11:568_8: therassa eko kammavipāko”ti saññaṁ katvā paṭhamaṁ therassa samīpena gacchantopi theraṁ avanditvā tassa
atk-s0508a11:568_9: kāraṇassa abhūtabhāvaṁ ñatvā āgamma theraṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinno “kacci, bhante,
atk-s0508a11:568_15: evarūpena parikkilesena saddhiṁ carantānaṁ tumhākaṁ ke nāma pasīdissanti,
atk-s0508a11:568_16: ito paṭṭhāya vo katthaci gamanakiccaṁ natthi,
atk-s0508a11:568_18: tumhe yoniso manasikāre mā pamajjitthā”ti nibaddhabhikkhaṁ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a11:568_19: Thero rājānaṁ upatthambhakaṁ labhitvā bhojanasappāyena ekaggacitto hutvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:569_0: Tadā mahāsubhaddā ugganagare micchādiṭṭhikakule vasamānā “satthā maṁ anukampatū”ti uposathaṁ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a11:569_1: nirāmagandhā hutvā uparipāsādatale ṭhitā “imāni pupphāni antare aṭṭhatvā dasabalassa matthake vitānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:569_3: dasabalo imāya saññāya sve pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṁ mayhaṁ bhikkhaṁ gaṇhatū”ti saccakiriyaṁ katvā aṭṭha sumanapupphamuṭṭhiyo vissajjesi.
atk-s0508a11:569_4: Pupphāni gantvā dhammadesanāvelāya satthu matthake vitānaṁ hutvā aṭṭhaṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:569_5: Satthā taṁ sumanapupphavitānaṁ disvā citteneva subhaddāya bhikkhaṁ adhivāsetvā punadivase aruṇe uṭṭhite ānandattheraṁ āha – “ānanda,
atk-s0508a11:569_14: Ānando “satthā tādisānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ salākaṁ na dāpeti,
atk-s0508a11:569_15: ariyānaṁyeva dāpetī”ti vitakkaṁ uppādetvā gantvā satthu ārocesi.
atk-s0508a11:569_20: bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti “kuṇḍadhānassa salākaṁ dassāmī”ti gamanaṁ abhinīhari.
atk-s0508a11:569_21: Kuṇḍadhāno tassa pure āgamanā eva abhiññāpādakaṁ catutthajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā iddhiyā ākāse ṭhatvā “āharāvuso, ānanda,
atk-s0508a11:569_23: mādisaṁ bhikkhuṁ paṭhamaṁ salākaṁ gaṇhantaṁ na satthā nivāretī”ti hatthaṁ pasāretvā salākaṁ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a11:569_24: Satthā taṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ katvā theraṁ imasmiṁ sāsane paṭhamaṁ salākaṁ gaṇhantānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a11:569_25: Yasmā ayaṁ thero rājānaṁ upatthambhakaṁ labhitvā sappāyāhāralābhena samāhitacitto vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto upanissayasampannatāya chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:578_0: “Ye ca santi samitāro, yakkhā imamhi pabbate;
atk-s0508a11:585_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:601_0: Evaṁbhūtassapi imassa therassa guṇe ajānantā ye puthujjanā bhikkhū tadā paṭhamaṁ salākaggahaṇe “kiṁ nu kho eta”nti samacintesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:601_1: Tesaṁ vimatividhamanatthaṁ thero ākāsaṁ abbhuggantvā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ dassetvā aññāpadesena aññaṁ byākaronto “pañca chinde”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:602_1: Tattha pañca chindeti apāyūpapattinibbattanakāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pāde bandhanarajjukaṁ
atk-s0508a11:602_2: viya puriso satthena heṭṭhimamaggattayena chindeyya pajaheyya.
atk-s0508a11:602_3: Pañca jaheti uparidevalokūpapattihetubhūtāni pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṁyojanāni puriso gīvāya bandhanarajjukaṁ viya arahattamaggena jaheyya,
atk-s0508a11:602_5: Pañca cuttari bhāvayeti tesaṁyeva uddhambhāgiyasaṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya saddhādīni pañcindriyāni uttari
atk-s0508a11:602_7: Pañcasaṅgātigoti evaṁbhūto pana pañcannaṁ rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgānaṁ atikkamanena pahānena pañcasaṅgātigo hutvā.
atk-s0508a11:602_9: kāmabhavadiṭṭhiavijjoghe taritvā tesaṁ pārabhūte nibbāne ṭhitoti ca vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0508a11:605_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a11:605_3: pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karonto upanissayasampattiyā abhāvena visesaṁ nibbattetuṁ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a11:605_4: Vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ pana bahuṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto ito ekatiṁse kappe vessabhuṁ
atk-s0508a11:605_6: So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatito sugatiṁ upagacchanto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:605_7: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbatto bhagavato abhisambodhiyā puretarameva uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0508a11:605_8: santike tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā aggiṁ paricaranto uruvelakassapadamane ādittapariyāyadesanāya purāṇajaṭilasahassena
atk-s0508a11:610_0: “Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a11:613_0: Evaṁ adhigatārahatto āyasmato dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa upajjhāyo ayaṁ thero ekadivasaṁ phalasamāpattito
atk-s0508a11:613_1: uṭṭhāya taṁ santaṁ paṇītaṁ nirāmisaṁ sukhaṁ attano pubbayogañca paccavekkhitvā pītivegavasena “yathāpi
atk-s0508a11:614_9: naṅgalaṁ ito cito ca āvattetvā khette kasanakoti attho.
atk-s0508a11:614_14: Sikhīti matthake avaṭṭhānato sikhāsadisatāya sikhā, siṅgaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:614_22: yathā “bhaddo usabhājānīyo kasane niyutto ghanatiṇamūlādikepi naṅgalapathe taṁ agaṇento appakasirena ito cito ca parivattento gacchati,
atk-s0508a11:614_24: evaṁ mamaṁ rattindivāpi appakasireneva gacchanti atikkamantī”ti.
atk-s0508a11:614_26: Yasmā kāmāmisalokāmisavaṭṭāmisehi asammissaṁ santaṁ paṇītaṁ phalasamāpattisukhaṁ laddhaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:614_28: Paccatte cetaṁ bhummavacanaṁ yathā “vanappagumbe” “tena vata re vattabbe”ti ca.
atk-s0508a11:614_29: Atha vā tato pabhuti rattindivā appakasirena gacchantīti vicāraṇāya āha –
atk-s0508a11:614_31: nirāmise sukhe laddhe sati tassa laddhakālato paṭṭhāyāti attho.
atk-s0508a11:617_2: So kira ito ekanavute kappe anuppanne tathāgate ajitassa nāma paccekabuddhassa gandhamādanato manussapathaṁ
atk-s0508a11:617_3: otaritvā aññatarasmiṁ gāme piṇḍāya carantassa manoramāni ambaphalāni adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:617_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle sāsane pabbajitvā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ bahuṁ puññaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:617_5: Evaṁ kusalakammappasuto hutvā sugatito sugatiṁ upagacchanto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ kulagehe nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:617_7: So anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā vihārapaṭijagganakamme ṭhapito sakkaccaṁ vihāraṁ paṭijagganto abhiṇhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:617_10: “ayaṁ kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto aññataraṁ khīṇāsavattheraṁ upaṭṭhahanto kiñci kammaṁ kārāpetukāmo theraṁ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0508a11:617_11: So tena kammena amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa dāsiyā kucchimhi nibbatto vayappatto
atk-s0508a11:617_12: seṭṭhinā vihārapaṭijaggane ṭhapito vuttanayeneva paṭiladdhasaddho ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:617_13: Mahāseṭṭhi tassa sīlācāraṁ ajjhāsayañca ñatvā bhujissaṁ katvā ‘yathāsukhaṁ pabbajā’ti āha.
atk-s0508a11:617_15: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya kusīto hīnavīriyo hutvā na kiñci vattapaṭivattaṁ karoti,
atk-s0508a11:617_18: Dhammassavanakālepi ekaṁ koṇaṁ pavisitvā parisapariyante nisinno ghurughurupassāsī niddāyateva.
atk-s0508a11:617_19: Athassa bhagavā pubbūpanissayaṁ oloketvā saṁvegajananatthaṁ “middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso cā”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:618_8: Samparivattasāyīti samparivattakaṁ samparivattakaṁ nipajjitvā ubhayenapi seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyuttoti dasseti.
atk-s0508a11:618_10: Gharasūkaro hi bālakālato paṭṭhāya posiyamāno thūlasarīrakāle gehā bahi nikkhamituṁ alabhanto heṭṭhāmañcādīsu
atk-s0508a11:618_13: yadā puriso middhī ca hoti mahagghaso ca nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho viya aññena iriyāpathena yāpetuṁ asakkonto niddāyanasīlo samparivattasāyī,
atk-s0508a11:618_14: tadā so “aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ anattā”ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni manasikātuṁ na sakkoti.
atk-s0508a11:618_15: Tesaṁ amanasikārā mandapañño punappunaṁ gabbhaṁ upeti,
atk-s0508a11:618_17: Taṁ sutvā dāsakatthero saṁvegajāto vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a11:623_0: “Ekanavute ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a11:626_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā thero imāya gāthāya maṁ bhagavā ovadi,
atk-s0508a11:626_1: “ayaṁ gāthā mayhaṁ aṅkusabhūtā”ti tameva gāthaṁ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:629_2: So kira ito catunavute kappe sataraṁsiṁ nāma paccekasambuddhaṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā attano hatthagataṁ tālaphalaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:629_3: Tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:629_4: kāle manussayoniyaṁ nibbatto sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho hutvā pabbajitvā aṭṭhikasaññaṁ bhāvesi.
atk-s0508a11:629_5: Puna imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto dārapariggahaṁ katvā ekaṁ puttaṁ labhitvā tassa “siṅgālako”ti nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:629_7: So aparabhāge gharabandhanaṁ pahāya sāsane pabbaji.
atk-s0508a11:629_8: Tassa bhagavā ajjhāsayaṁ olokento aṭṭhikasaññākammaṭṭhānaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:629_9: So taṁ gahetvā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane,
atk-s0508a11:629_10: athassa tasmiṁ vane adhivatthā devatā ussāhajananatthaṁ “bhāvanāphalaṁ nacirasseva hatthagataṁ karissatī”ti
atk-s0508a11:629_11: imamatthaṁ aññāpadesena vibhāventī “ahu buddhassa dāyādo”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:630_4: Dāyādoti dhammadāyādo navavidhassa lokuttaradhammadāyassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā ādāyako gaṇhanako.
atk-s0508a11:630_6: Evaṁnāmassa buddhassa dāyādabhāve koci vibandho idāneva bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:630_9: Bhesakaḷāvaneti bhesakena nāma yakkhena labhitattā pariggahitattā,
atk-s0508a11:630_10: bhesakaḷānaṁ vā kaṭṭhādīnaṁ bahulatāya “bhesakaḷāvana”nti laddhanāme araññe.
atk-s0508a11:630_11: Tassa bhikkhuno buddhassa dāyādabhāve kāraṇaṁ vadanto “kevalaṁ aṭṭhisaññāya,
atk-s0508a11:630_17: Attabhāvo hi idha “pathavī”ti vutto “ko imaṁ pathaviṁ viccessatī”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0508a11:630_21: Khippameva nacirasseva kāmarāgaṁ pahissati pajahissatīti maññe. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a11:630_24: yo ekasmiṁ padese laddhāya atthikasaññāya sakalaṁ attano sabbesaṁ vā attabhāvaṁ “aṭṭhī”tveva pharitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0508a11:630_25: so bhikkhu taṁ aṭṭhikajhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā vipassanto nacireneva anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:630_27: rañjanaṭṭhena “rāgo”ti ca laddhanāmaṁ taṇhaṁ aggamaggena pajahissatīti.
atk-s0508a11:630_28: Imaṁ gāthaṁ sutvā so thero “ayaṁ devatā mayhaṁ ussāhajananatthaṁ evamāhā”ti appaṭivānavīriyaṁ adhiṭṭhāya vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:638_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā tāya devatāya vuttavacanaṁ patimānento tameva gāthaṁ udānavasena abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:641_2: Ayaṁ kira thero pubbepi vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ bahuṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā adhikārasampanno vipassiṁ bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:641_3: ākāse gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso nāḷikeraphalaṁ dātukāmo aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:641_4: Satthā tassa cittaṁ ñatvā otaritvā paṭiggaṇhi.
atk-s0508a11:641_5: So ativiya pasannacitto hutvā teneva saddhāpaṭilābhena satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci,
atk-s0508a11:641_8: So pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado samaṇadhammaṁ katvā tato cuto chapi buddhantarāni devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a11:641_11: So vayappatto sāsane laddhappasādo bhagavato santike pabbajitvā vikkhepabahulatāya visesaṁ nibbattetuṁ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a11:641_12: Athekadivasaṁ gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisanto antarāmagge bhūmiṁ khaṇitvā udakavāhakaṁ katvā icchiticchitaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a11:641_13: udakaṁ nente purise disvā taṁ sallakkhetvā gāmaṁ paviṭṭho aññataraṁ usukāraṁ usudaṇḍakaṁ usuyante pakkhipitvā
atk-s0508a11:641_14: akkhikoṭiyā oloketvā ujuṁ karontaṁ disvā tampi sallakkhetvā gacchanto purato gantvā araneminābhiādike
atk-s0508a11:641_15: rathacakkāvayave tacchante tacchake disvā tampi sallakkhetvā vihāraṁ pavisitvā katabhattakicco pattacīvaraṁ
atk-s0508a11:641_16: paṭisāmetvā divāvihāre nisinno attanā diṭṭhanimittāni upamābhāvena gahetvā attano cittadamane upanento
atk-s0508a11:641_17: “acetanaṁ udakampi manussā icchikicchitaṭṭhānaṁ nayanti tathā acetanaṁ vaṅkampi saradaṇḍaṁ upāyena namento
atk-s0508a11:641_19: tathā acetanaṁ kaṭṭhakaḷiṅgarādiṁ tacchakā nemiādivasena vaṅkaṁ ujuñca karonti.
atk-s0508a11:641_20: Atha kasmā ahaṁ sakacittaṁ ujuṁ na karissāmī”ti cintetvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:655_0: Evaṁ yāni nimittāni aṅkuse katvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0508a11:655_1: tehi saddhiṁ attano cittadamanaṁ saṁsanditvā aññaṁ byākaronto “udakañhi nayanti nettikā”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:656_3: Nayantīti pathaviyā taṁ taṁ thalaṭṭhānaṁ khaṇitvā ninnaṭṭhānaṁ pūretvā mātikaṁ vā katvā rukkhadoṇiṁ vā ṭhapetvā attano icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṁ nenti.
atk-s0508a11:656_7: nettikā attano ruciyā icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṁ udakaṁ nayanti,
atk-s0508a11:656_8: usukārāpi tāpetvā tejanaṁ namayanti ujuṁ karonti.
atk-s0508a11:656_9: Namanavasena tacchakā nemiādīnaṁ atthāya tacchantā dāruṁ namayanti attano ruciyā ujuṁ vā vaṅkaṁ vā karonti.
