atk-s0508a11:2073_11: katipāhameva manasikaritvā taṁ chaḍḍetvā yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā divasabhāgaṁ saṅgaṇikārāmo
atk-s0508a11:2073_14: Satthā tassa hetuparipākaṁ oloketvā ovādaṁ dento –
atk-s0508a11:2076_0: Kudāssu nāma dummedho, dukkhassantaṁ karissatī”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2077_2: “rattiyā paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodhetī”tiādinā vuttaṁ jāgariyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2077_3: ananuyuñjitvā kevalaṁ rattiyā tīsupi yāmesu niddaṁ okkamitvāti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2077_7: tasmiṁ rato abhirato tattha avigatacchando “saṅgaṇike rato”ti vutto “saṅgaṇikārato”tipi pāḷi.
atk-s0508a11:2078_0: Evaṁ pana satthārā gāthāya kathitāya thero saṁvegajāto vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2094_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā thero aññaṁ byākaronto tameva gāthaṁ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2097_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto ito ekattiṁse
atk-s0508a11:2097_3: kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū hutvā araññāyatane
atk-s0508a11:2097_4: assame vasanto tīṇi brāhmaṇasahassāni mante vācesi.
atk-s0508a11:2097_5: Athekadivasaṁ tassa satthāraṁ disvā lakkhaṇāni upadhāretvā lakkhaṇamante parivattentassa,
atk-s0508a11:2097_6: “īdisehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato anantajino anantañāṇo buddho bhavissatī”ti buddhañāṇaṁ ārabbha uḷāro pasādo uppajji.
atk-s0508a11:2097_7: So tena cittappasādena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde nālakagāme
atk-s0508a11:2097_10: So dhammasenāpatissa gihisahāyo therassa santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā dassanabhūmiyaṁ patiṭṭhito pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2111_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā bhikkhūnaṁ dhammadesanāpadesena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a11:2114_0: Jhāyaṁ nipako patissato, adhigaccheyya sukhaṁ nirāmisa”nti. –
atk-s0508a11:2116_0: Tattha cittanimittassa kovidoti bhāvanācittassa nimittaggahaṇe kusalo,
atk-s0508a11:2116_3: imasmiṁ ajjhupekkhitabba”nti evaṁ paggahaṇādiyogyassa cittanimittassa gahaṇe cheko.
atk-s0508a11:2116_4: Pavivekarasaṁ vijāniyāti kāyavivekasaṁvaḍḍhitassa cittavivekassa rasaṁ sañjānitvā,
atk-s0508a11:2116_7: Jhāyanti paṭhamaṁ ārammaṇūpanijjhānena pacchā lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyanto.
atk-s0508a11:2116_10: Adhigaccheyya sukhaṁ nirāmisanti evaṁ samathanimittādikosallena labbhe cittavivekasukhe patiṭṭhāya sato
atk-s0508a11:2116_11: sampajāno hutvā vipassanājhāneneva jhāyanto kāmāmisavaṭṭāmisehi asammissatāya nirāmisaṁ nibbānasukhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2119_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle nārado nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā ekadivasaṁ māḷake nisinno bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2119_3: bhikkhusaṅghena purakkhataṁ gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso tīhi gāthāhi abhitthavi.
atk-s0508a11:2119_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2119_7: So bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṁ viharante madhupiṇḍikasuttaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2127_0: Vikappetuṁ na sakkonti, ko disvā nappasīdati.
atk-s0508a11:2135_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthu avitathadesanataṁ dhammassa ca niyyānikataṁ nissāya sañjātapītisomanasso pītivegappavissaṭṭhaṁ udānaṁ udānento –
atk-s0508a11:2137_0: “Ito bahiddhā puthuaññavādinaṁ, maggo na nibbānagamo yathā ayaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:2138_0: Itissu saṅghaṁ bhagavānusāsati, satthā sayaṁ pāṇitaleva dassaya”nti. –
atk-s0508a11:2140_0: Tattha ito bahiddhāti imasmā buddhasāsanā bāhirake samaye,
atk-s0508a11:2140_3: Maggo na nibbānagamo yathā ayanti yathā ayaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo ekaṁsena nibbānaṁ gacchatīti nibbānagamo,
atk-s0508a11:2140_5: evaṁ nibbānagamo maggo titthiyasamaye natthi asammāsambuddhappaveditattā aññatitthiyavādassa.
atk-s0508a11:2142_8: Vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyaṁ itivuttakavaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttanayena veditabbo.
atk-s0508a11:2142_12: “sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgaho sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ aṅgānaṁ vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko nibbānagāmī ariyamaggo yathā mama sāsane atthi,
atk-s0508a11:2142_13: evaṁ bāhirakasamaye maggo nāma natthī”ti sīhanādaṁ nadanto amhākaṁ satthā bhagavā sayameva sayambhūñāṇena ñātaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2142_14: sayameva vā mahākaruṇāsañcodito hutvā attano desanāvilāsasampattiyā hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya dassento
atk-s0508a11:2145_0: Khandhā diṭṭhā yathābhūtanti āyasmato paviṭṭhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2145_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ karonto atthadassissa
atk-s0508a11:2145_3: bhagavato kāle kesavo nāma tāpaso hutvā ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2145_4: abhivādetvā añjaliṁ paggayha padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a11:2145_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2145_6: magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uppajjitvā anukkamena viññutaṁ patto nekkhammaninnajjhāsayatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2145_7: pabbajitvā tattha sikkhitabbaṁ sikkhitvā vicaranto upatissakolitānaṁ buddhasāsane pabbajitabhāvaṁ sutvā
atk-s0508a11:2145_9: tadeva maññe seyyo”ti satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji.
atk-s0508a11:2145_11: So vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2146_0: “Nārado iti me nāmaṁ, kesavo iti maṁ vidū;
atk-s0508a11:2149_0: Assāsayanto satte so, dhammaṁ deseti cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a11:2158_0: Vikkhīṇo jātisaṁsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2159_1: te hi vipassanupalakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca ñātapariññādīhi parijānanavasena vipassitabbā.
atk-s0508a11:2159_2: Diṭṭhā yathābhūtanti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya “idaṁ dukkha”ntiādinā aviparītato diṭṭhā.
atk-s0508a11:2159_3: Bhavā sabbe padālitāti kāmabhavādayo sabbe kammabhavā upapattibhavā ca maggañāṇasatthena bhinnā viddhaṁsitā.
atk-s0508a11:2159_4: Kilesapadālaneneva hi kammopapattibhavā padālitā nāma honti.
atk-s0508a11:2162_0: Asakkhiṁ vata attānanti āyasmato ajjunattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2162_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0508a11:2162_3: bhagavato kāle sīhayoniyaṁ nibbatto ekadivasaṁ araññe aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisinnaṁ satthāraṁ disvā
atk-s0508a11:2162_4: “ayaṁ kho imasmiṁ kāle sabbaseṭṭho purisasīho”ti pasannamānaso supupphitasālasākhaṁ bhañjitvā satthāraṁ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a11:2162_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ seṭṭhikule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:2162_7: So viññutaṁ patto nigaṇṭhehi kataparicayo hutvā “evāhaṁ amataṁ adhigamissāmī”ti vivaṭṭajjhāsayatāya daharakāleyeva
atk-s0508a11:2162_8: nigaṇṭhesu pabbajitvā tattha sāraṁ alabhanto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a11:2174_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā anuttarasukhādhigamasambhūtena pītivegena udānaṁ udānento –
atk-s0508a11:2177_0: Vuyhamāno mahogheva, saccāni paṭivijjhaha”nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2179_2: katamaṁ nu kho dukkarataraṁ vā durabhisambhavataraṁ vā,
atk-s0508a11:2179_3: yaṁ sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyā”tiādi ?
atk-s0508a11:2180_1: Yo hi paro na hoti so attāti.
atk-s0508a11:2180_8: yathā nāma gambhīravitthate appatiṭṭhe mahati udakoghe vegasā vuyhamāno puriso kenaci atthakāmena upanītaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2180_9: phiyārittasampannaṁ daḷhanāvaṁ labhitvā sukheneva tato attānaṁ uddharituṁ sakkuṇeyya pāraṁ pāpuṇeyya,
atk-s0508a11:2180_10: evamevāhaṁ saṁsāramahoghe kilesābhisaṅkhāravegena vuyhamāno satthārā upanītaṁ samathavipassanupetaṁ ariyamagganāvaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2180_11: labhitvā tato attānaṁ uddharituṁ nibbānathalaṁ pattuṁ aho asakkhinti.
atk-s0508a11:2180_14: Yasmā ahaṁ dukkhādīni cattāri ariyasaccāni pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhiṁ ariyamaggañāṇena aññāsiṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2180_15: tasmā asakkhiṁ vata attānaṁ uddhātuṁ udakā thalanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a11:2183_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:2183_3: kāle pārāvatayoniyaṁ nibbatto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso piyālaphalaṁ upanesi.
atk-s0508a11:2183_5: So tena ativiya pasannacitto hutvā kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā cittaṁ pasādeti.
atk-s0508a11:2183_6: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2183_7: aññatarassa maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatto taruṇakāleyeva rajje patiṭṭhito rajjasukhamanubhavanto
atk-s0508a11:2183_10: So dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho saṁvegajāto rajjaṁ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2187_0: Deyyadhammo ca me natthi, dvipadindassa tādino.
atk-s0508a11:2192_0: “Ekattiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ ahaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:2197_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇavasena uppannasomanasso udānaṁ udānento –
atk-s0508a11:2200_0: Mutto oghā ca ganthā ca, sabbe mānā visaṁhatā”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2201_7: puttadārādivisayo bahalo chandarāgo vuttanayena sammakkhanato duruttaraṇato ca.
atk-s0508a11:2201_8: Te mayā anāgāmimaggena sabbaso atikkantāti āha “uttiṇṇā paṅkapalipā”ti.
atk-s0508a11:2201_12: Idha pana agāhaduravaggāhaduruttaraṇaṭṭhena pātālā viyāti pātālā, diṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0508a11:2201_13: Te ca mayā paṭhamamaggādhigameneva sabbathā vajjitā samucchinnāti āha “pātālā parivajjitā”ti mutto oghā
atk-s0508a11:2201_14: ca ganthā cāti kāmoghādioghato abhijjhākāyaganthādiganthato ca tena tena maggena mutto parimutto,
atk-s0508a11:2201_16: Sabbe mānā visaṁhatāti navavidhāpi mānā aggamaggādhigamena visesato saṅghātaṁ vināsaṁ āpāditā samucchinnā “mānavidhā hatā”ti keci paṭhanti,
atk-s0508a11:2201_19: tesaṁ pana mānavisassa dukkhassa phalato mānavisāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0508a11:2204_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto satthari
atk-s0508a11:2204_3: parinibbute tassa thūpe pupphehi chattātichattaṁ katvā pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2204_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2204_5: rājagahe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2204_7: So anukkamena viññutaṁ patto buddhānubhāvaṁ sutvā upāsakehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gato satthāraṁ dhammaṁ desentaṁ disvā pasannamānaso ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a11:2204_8: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṁ oloketvā tathā dhammaṁ desesi,
atk-s0508a11:2204_9: yathā saddhaṁ paṭilabhi saṁsāre ca saṁvegaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2204_10: So paṭiladdhasaddho saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā ñāṇassa aparipakkattā katipayakālaṁ alasabahulī vihāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2204_11: Puna satthārā dhammadesanāya samuttejito vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā tattha yuttappayutto viharanto nacireneva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2214_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana”nti.
atk-s0508a11:2215_1: uttarimanussadhammo adhigato”ti puṭṭho sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṁ attano ca dhammānudhammappaṭipattiṁ tesaṁ pavedento aññābyākaraṇavasena –
atk-s0508a11:2218_0: Vikkhīṇo jātisaṁsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2219_0: Tattha pañcakkhandhā pariññātāti mayā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā “idaṁ dukkhaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2219_2: na tato bhiyyo”ti tīhi pariññāhi paricchinditvā ñātā viditā paṭividdhā.
atk-s0508a11:2219_3: Tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakāti tathā pariññātattāyeva mūlabhūtassa samudayassa sabbaso pahīnattā te idāni yāva carimakacittanirodho tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā,
atk-s0508a11:2224_0: Natathā mataṁ satarasanti āyasmato paripuṇṇakattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2224_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro dhammadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto satthari
atk-s0508a11:2224_3: parinibbute satthu cetiye pupphādīhi uḷāraṁ pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2224_4: So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2224_5: kapilavatthusmiṁ sakyarājakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto paripuṇṇavibhavatāya paripuṇṇakoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a11:2224_6: So vibhavasampannatāya sabbakālaṁ satarasaṁ nāma āhāraṁ paribhuñjanto satthu missakāhāraparibhogaṁ sutvā
atk-s0508a11:2224_7: “tāva sukhumālopi bhagavā nibbānasukhaṁ apekkhitvā yathā tathā yāpeti,
atk-s0508a11:2224_8: kasmā mayaṁ āhāragiddhā hutvā āhārasuddhikā bhavissāma,
atk-s0508a11:2224_9: nibbānasukhameva pana amhehi pariyesitabba”nti saṁsāre jātasaṁvego gharāvāsaṁ pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a11:2224_10: bhagavatā kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne niyojito tattha patiṭṭhāya paṭiladdhajhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a11:2224_11: kammaṁ karonto vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2229_0: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a11:2234_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā dhamme gāravabahumānena pītivegavissaṭṭhaṁ udānaṁ udānento “na tathā mataṁ satarasa”nti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2235_2: sudhannaṁ yaṁ mayajja paribhuttanti tathāti tena pakārena.
atk-s0508a11:2235_4: Satarasanti satarasabhojanaṁ “satarasabhojanaṁ nāma satapākasappiādīhi abhisaṅkhataṁ bhojana”nti vadanti.
atk-s0508a11:2235_5: Atha vā anekattho satasaddo “sataso sahassaso”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0508a11:2235_9: Sudhā eva annaṁ sudhābhojanaṁ devānaṁ āhāro.
atk-s0508a11:2235_10: Yaṁ mayajja paribhuttanti yaṁ mayā ajja anubhuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2235_11: “Yaṁ mayā paribhutta”nti ca idaṁ “satarasaṁ sudhanna”nti etthāpi yojetabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2235_13: yaṁ mayā ajja etarahi nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanavasena phalasamāpattisamāpajjanavasena ca accantameva
atk-s0508a11:2235_15: taṁ yathā mataṁ abhimataṁ sambhāvitaṁ tathā rājakāle mayā paribhuttaṁ satarasabhojanaṁ devattabhāve paribhuttaṁ sudhannañca na mataṁ nābhimataṁ. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a11:2235_17: taṁ pana puthujjanasevitaṁ sāmisaṁ kilesānaṁ vatthubhūtaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2235_18: taṁ imassa saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upetīti.
atk-s0508a11:2235_19: Idāni “yaṁ mayajja paribhutta”nti vuttadhammaṁ desento aparimitadassinā gotamena,
atk-s0508a11:2235_22: aparimitaṁ aparicchinnaṁ uppādavayābhāvato santaṁ asaṅkhatadhātuṁ sayambhūñāṇena passī,
atk-s0508a11:2235_23: aparimitassa anantāparimeyyassa ñeyyassa dassāvīti tena aparimitadassinā gotamagottena sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0508a11:2235_24: “khayaṁ virāgaṁ amataṁ paṇīta”nti ca “madanimmadano pipāsavinayo” “sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti ca ādinā suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a11:2238_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro piyadassissa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2238_3: patto satthari parinibbute tassa thūpassa ratanakhacitaṁ vedikaṁ kāretvā tattha uḷāraṁ vedikāmahaṁ kāresi.
atk-s0508a11:2238_4: So tena puññakammena anekasate attabhāve maṇiobhāsena vicari.
atk-s0508a11:2238_5: Evaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2238_7: So vayappatto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ gato tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññāyatane jhānalābhī hutvā
atk-s0508a11:2238_8: viharanto buddhuppādaṁ sutvā uppannappasādo satthu santikaṁ upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a11:2238_10: So dhammaṁ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2242_0: Vedikāya mahaṁ katvā, tattha kālaṅkato ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2248_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā aññaṁ byākaronto “yassāsavā parikkhīṇā”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2249_1: Tattha yassāsavā parikkhīṇāti yassa uttamapuggalassa kāmāsavādayo cattāro āsavā sabbaso khīṇā ariyamaggena khepitā.
atk-s0508a11:2249_2: Āhāre ca anissitoti yo ca āhāre taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi anissito agadhito anajjhāpanno,
atk-s0508a11:2249_15: Phalasamāpattivasena taṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā viharantassa ayampi tividho vimokkho yassa gocaro,
atk-s0508a11:2249_17: padaṁ tassa durannayanti yathā ākāse gacchantānaṁ sakuṇānaṁ “imasmiṁ ṭhāne pādehi akkamitvā gatā,
atk-s0508a11:2249_21: evameva evarūpassa bhikkhuno “nirayapadādīsu iminā nāma padena gato”ti ñāpetuñca na sakkāti.
atk-s0508a11:2252_0: Dukkhā kāmā erakāti āyasmato erakattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2252_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a11:2252_3: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso satthu kiñci dātabbayuttakaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2252_4: alabhanto “handāhaṁ kāyasāraṁ puññaṁ karissāmī”ti satthu gamanamaggaṁ sodhetvā samaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2252_6: So tattha bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā añjaliṁ paggayha pasannacitto yāva dassanupacārasamatikkamā
atk-s0508a11:2252_8: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2252_9: sāvatthiyaṁ sambhāvanīyassa kuṭumbiyassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2252_10: erakotissa nāmaṁ ahosi abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko itikattabbatāsu paramena veyyattiyena samannāgato.
atk-s0508a11:2252_11: Tassa mātāpitaro kulena rūpena ācārena vayena kosallena ca anucchavikaṁ dārikaṁ ānetvā vivāhakammaṁ akaṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:2252_12: So tāya saddhiṁ saṁvāsena gehe vasanto pacchimabhavikattā kenacideva saṁvegavatthunā saṁsāre saṁviggamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2252_13: satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji,
atk-s0508a11:2252_15: So kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā katipayadivasātikkamena ukkaṇṭhābhibhūto vihāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2252_16: Atha satthā tassa cittappavattiṁ ñatvā ovādavasena “dukkhā kāmā erakā”ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2252_18: yohaṁ evarūpassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā taṁ vissajjento micchāvitakkabahulo vihāsi”nti saṁvegajāto
atk-s0508a11:2264_0: “Dukkhā kāmā eraka, na sukhā kāmā eraka;
atk-s0508a11:2265_0: Yo kāme kāmayati, dukkhaṁ so kāmayati eraka;
atk-s0508a11:2266_0: Yo kāme na kāmayati, dukkhaṁ so na kāmayati erakā”ti. –
atk-s0508a11:2268_0: Tattha dukkhā kāmāti ime vatthukāmakilesakāmā dukkhavatthutāya vipariṇāmadukkhasaṁsāradukkhasabhāvato ca,
atk-s0508a11:2268_5: Erakāti paṭhamaṁ tāva bhagavā taṁ ālapati,
atk-s0508a11:2268_6: pacchā pana thero attānaṁ nāmena kathesi.
atk-s0508a11:2268_7: Na sukhā kāmāti kāmā nāmete jānantassa sukhā na honti,
atk-s0508a11:2268_12: dukkhaṁ so kāmayatīti yo satto kilesakāmena vatthukāme kāmayati,
atk-s0508a11:2268_14: āyatiṁ apāyadukkhahetutāya ca vaṭṭadukkhahetutāya ca dukkhaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2268_16: Iti so dukkhasabhāvaṁ dukkhanimittaṁ dukkhavatthuñca kāmayatīti vutto.
atk-s0508a11:2271_0: Namohi tassa bhagavatoti āyasmato mettajittherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2271_2: So kira anomadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto sāsane abhippasanno hutvā bodhirukkhassa
atk-s0508a11:2271_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2271_6: magadharaṭṭhe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2271_8: So vayappatto kāmesu ādīnavaṁ disvā tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññe viharanto buddhuppādaṁ sutvā pubbahetunā
atk-s0508a11:2271_9: codiyamāno satthu santikaṁ gantvā pavattinivattiyo ārabbha pañhaṁ pucchitvā satthārā pañhe vissajjite
atk-s0508a11:2271_10: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2275_0: Bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a11:2286_0: Tenāyaṁ aggappattena, aggadhammo sudesito”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2287_2: Tassāti yo so bhagavā samattiṁsapāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0508a11:2287_4: Anaññasādhāraṇāya puññasampattiyā ca sambhāvito uttamāya rūpakāyasiriyā dhammakāyasiriyā ca samannāgatattā sirīmā,
atk-s0508a11:2287_5: tassa bhagavato sakyaputtassa sirīmato namo atthu,
atk-s0508a11:2287_8: Ayanti tassa dhammassa attano paccakkhatāya vadati.
atk-s0508a11:2287_10: sabbehi vā guṇehi aggabhāvaṁ seṭṭhabhāvaṁ pattena.
atk-s0508a11:2287_11: Aggadhammoti aggo uttamo navavidhalokuttaro dhammo suṭṭhu aviparītaṁ desito paveditoti.
atk-s0508a11:2290_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a11:2290_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto bhagavati parinibbute thūpamahe kayiramāne umāpupphaṁ gahetvā thūpaṁ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a11:2290_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2290_5: sāvatthiyaṁ mahāsuvaṇṇassa nāma kuṭumbikassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2290_7: Mātā tassa ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle aññaṁ puttaṁ labhi.
atk-s0508a11:2290_8: Tassa mātāpitaro cūḷapāloti nāmaṁ katvā itaraṁ mahāpāloti vohariṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:2290_10: Tasmiṁ samaye satthā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane.
atk-s0508a11:2290_11: Tattha mahāpālo jetavanaṁ gacchantehi upāsakehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a11:2290_12: kuṭumbabhāraṁ kaniṭṭhabhātikasseva bhāraṁ katvā sayaṁ pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado ācariyupajjhāyānaṁ santike
atk-s0508a11:2290_13: pañcavassāni vasitvā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā saṭṭhimatte sahāyabhikkhū
atk-s0508a11:2290_14: labhitvā tehi saddhiṁ bhāvanānukūlaṁ vasanaṭṭhānaṁ pariyesanto aññataraṁ paccantagāmaṁ nissāya gāmavāsikehi
atk-s0508a11:2290_15: upāsakehi kāretvā dinnāya araññāyatane paṇṇasālāya vasanto samaṇadhammaṁ karoti.
atk-s0508a11:2290_20: So “akkhirogavūpasamanato kilesarogavūpasamanameva mayhaṁ vara”nti akkhirogaṁ ajjhupekkhitvā vipassanāyayeva yuttappayutto ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2290_21: Tassa bhāvanaṁ ussukkāpentassa apubbaṁ acarimaṁ akkhīni ceva kilesā ca bhijjiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:2300_0: Atha there akkhirogena vihāre ohīne gāmaṁ piṇḍāya gate bhikkhū disvā upāsakā “kasmā thero nāgato”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0508a11:2300_3: idāni mayameva piṇḍapātaṁ ānetvā upaṭṭhahissāmā”ti tathā karonti.
atk-s0508a11:2300_4: Bhikkhū therassa ovāde ṭhatvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ patvā vuṭṭhavassā pavāretvā,
atk-s0508a11:2300_9: mayā saddhiṁ gacchantānaṁ tumhākaṁ parissayo bhavissati,
atk-s0508a11:2300_11: gantvā satthāraṁ mahāthere ca mama vandanāya vandatha,
atk-s0508a11:2300_12: cūḷapālassa mama pavattiṁ kathetvā kañci purisaṁ peseyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a11:2300_13: Te punapi yācitvā gamanaṁ alabhantā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā upāsake āpucchitvā anukkamena
atk-s0508a11:2300_14: jetavanaṁ gantvā satthāraṁ mahāthere ca tassa vandanāya vanditvā dutiyadivase sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0508a11:2300_15: cūḷapālassa taṁ pavattiṁ vatvā tena “ayaṁ, bhante,
atk-s0508a11:2300_21: So anukkamena therassa santikaṁ gantvā attānaṁ tassa orocetvā taṁ gahetvā āgacchanto antarāmagge aññatarassa
atk-s0508a11:2300_22: gāmassa sāmantā araññaṭṭhāne ekissā kaṭṭhahāriyā gāyantiyā saddaṁ sutvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2300_24: muhuttaṁ yāvāhaṁ āgacchāmī”ti vatvā tassā santikaṁ gantvā tattha sīlavipattiṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2300_31: Sāmaṇero tuṇhī hutvā puna pucchitopi na kathesi.
atk-s0508a11:2300_33: gaccha tva”nti vatvā puna tena “bahuparissayo maggo,
atk-s0508a11:2300_35: kathaṁ gamissathā”ti vutte “bāla idheva me nipajjitvā marantassāpi aparāparaṁ parivattentassāpi tādisena gamanaṁ nāma natthī”ti imamatthaṁ dassento –
atk-s0508a11:2303_0: Sayamānopi gacchissaṁ, na sahāyena pāpenā”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsittha;
atk-s0508a11:2304_4: Atha vā “andho”ti idaṁ “andhe jiṇṇe mātāpitaro posetī”tiādīsu viya maṁsacakkhuvekalladīpanaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2304_5: “sabbepime paribbājakā andhā acakkhukā” “andho ekacakkhu dvicakkhū”tiādīsu viya na paññācakkhuvekalladīpananti dassetuṁ “hatanettosmī”ti vuttaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2304_9: Tādisañhi kantāraddhānaṁ ayaṁ thero samatikkamitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0508a11:2304_11: pādesu avahantesu urena jaṇṇukāhi ca bhūmiyaṁ saṁsaranto parivattentopi gaccheyyaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2304_12: Na sahāyena pāpenāti tādisena pāpapuggalena sahāyabhūtena saddhiṁ na gacchissanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a11:2304_13: Taṁ sutvā itaro saṁvegajāto “bhāriyaṁ vata mayā sāhasikakammaṁ kata”nti bāhā paggayha kandanto vanasaṇḍaṁ pakkhando ca ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2304_14: Atha therassa sīlatejena paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṁ uṇhākāraṁ dassesi.
atk-s0508a11:2304_15: Tena sakko taṁ kāraṇaṁ ñatvā therassa santikaṁ gantvā sāvatthigāmipurisaṁ viya attānaṁ ñāpetvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2304_16: gaṇhanto maggaṁ saṅkhipitvā tadaheva sāyanhe sāvatthiyaṁ theraṁ netvā tattha jetavane cūḷapālitena kāritāya
atk-s0508a11:2304_17: paṇṇasālāya phalake nisīdāpetvā tassa sahāyavaṇṇena therassa āgatabhāvaṁ jānāpetvā pakkāmi;
atk-s0508a11:2307_2: So kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto satthari parinibbute tassa
atk-s0508a11:2307_3: thūpassa samantato candanavedikāya parikkhipitvā mahantaṁ pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2307_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu uḷāraṁ sampattiṁ anubhavanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kuṭumbikakule
atk-s0508a11:2307_5: nibbatto satthari parinibbute kanakathūpaṁ uddissa raññā pupphapūjāya kayiramānāya pupphāni alabhanto
atk-s0508a11:2307_6: ekaṁ khaṇḍasumanapupphaṁ disvā mahatā mūlena taṁ kiṇitvā gaṇhanto cetiye pūjaṁ karonto uḷāraṁ pītisomanassaṁ uppādesi.
atk-s0508a11:2307_7: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā asīti vassakoṭiyo saggasukhaṁ anubhavitvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde pāvāyaṁ mallarājakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:2307_8: Tassa jātakāle gehe khaṇḍasakkharā sumanapupphāni ca uppannāni ahesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2307_10: So viññutaṁ patto bhagavati pāvāyaṁ cundassa ambavane viharante upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a11:2307_11: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2315_0: Omattaṁ me na passāmi, pubbakammassidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2319_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano purimajātiṁ anussaranto tattha attano sumanapupphapariccāgassa saggasampattinimittakaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2322_0: Saggesu paricāretvā, sesakenamhi nibbuto”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2323_3: Asīti vassakoṭiyoti manussagaṇanāya vassānaṁ asīti koṭiyo,
atk-s0508a11:2323_5: idañca chasu kāmasaggesu dutiye aparāparuppattivasena vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2323_8: Paricāretvāti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu indriyāni paricāretvā sukhaṁ anubhavitvā,
atk-s0508a11:2323_10: Sesakenamhi nibbutoti pupphapūjāya vasena pavattakusalacetanāsu bhavasampatti dāyakakammato sesena yaṁ tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2323_12: Bahū hi tattha pubbāparavasena pavattā cetanā.
atk-s0508a11:2323_13: Sesakenāti vā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena aparikkhīṇeyeva tasmiṁ kammavipāke nibbuto amhi,
atk-s0508a11:2323_15: Etena yasmiṁ attabhāve ṭhatvā attanā arahattaṁ sacchikataṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2323_17: Yādisaṁ sandhāya aññatthāpi “tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2326_0: Hitvā satapalaṁ kaṁsanti āyasmato tissattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2326_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro vipassissa bhagavato kāle yānakārakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2326_3: bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso candanakhaṇḍena phalakaṁ katvā bhagavato upanāmesi,
atk-s0508a11:2326_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde roruvanagare rājakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:2326_6: So vayappatto pitari kālaṅkate rajje patiṭṭhito bimbisārarañño adiṭṭhasahāyo hutvā tassa maṇimuttāvatthādīni paṇṇākārāni pesesi.
atk-s0508a11:2326_7: Tassa rājā bimbisāro puññavantataṁ sutvā paṭipābhataṁ pesento cittapaṭe buddhacaritaṁ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe ca paṭiccasamuppādaṁ likhāpetvā pesesi.
atk-s0508a11:2326_8: So taṁ disvā purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya pacchimabhavikatāya ca cittapaṭe dassentaṁ buddhacaritaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2326_9: suvaṇṇapaṭṭake likhitaṁ paṭiccasamuppādakkamañca oloketvā pavattinivattiyo sallakkhetvā sāsanakkamaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2326_10: hadaye ṭhapetvā sañjātasaṁvego “diṭṭho mayā bhagavato veso,
atk-s0508a11:2326_13: kiṁ dāni mayhaṁ gharāvāsenā”ti rajjaṁ pahāya kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādento bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2326_14: uddissa pabbajitvā mattikāpattaṁ gahetvā rājā pukkusāti viya mahājanassa paridevantasseva nagarato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0508a11:2326_15: anukkamena rājagahaṁ gantvā tattha sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre viharantaṁ bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0508a11:2326_18: So dhammadesanaṁ sutvā vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā yuttappayutto viharanto vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2332_0: Akkhubbhaṁ ratanaṁ mayhaṁ, phalakassa idaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2338_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā udānavasena attano paṭipattiṁ kathento –
atk-s0508a11:2341_0: Aggahiṁ mattikāpattaṁ, idaṁ dutiyābhisecana”nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2342_5: Satarājikanti bhittivicittatāya ca anekarūparājicittatāya ca anekalekhāyuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2342_6: Aggahiṁ mattikāpattanti evarūpe mahārahe bhājane pubbe bhuñjitvā buddhānaṁ ovādaṁ karonto “idānāhaṁ taṁ chaḍḍetvā mattikāmayapattaṁ aggahesiṁ, aho, sādhu,
atk-s0508a11:2342_7: mayā kataṁ ariyavataṁ anuṭhita”nti bhājanakittanāpadesena rajjapariccāgaṁ pabbajjūpagamanañca anumodanto vadati.
atk-s0508a11:2342_9: Paṭhamaṁ rajjābhisecanaṁ upādāya idaṁ pabbajjūpagamanaṁ mama dutiyaṁ abhisecanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2342_10: Tañhi rāgādīhi saṁkiliṭṭhaṁ sāsaṅkaṁ saparisaṅkaṁ kammaṁ anatthasañhitaṁ dukkhapaṭibaddhaṁ nihīnaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2342_11: idaṁ pana taṁvipariyāyato uttamaṁ paṇītanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:2345_0: Rūpaṁ disvā sati muṭṭhāti āyasmato abhayattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2345_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:2345_3: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ sumedhaṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannacitto saḷalapupphehi
atk-s0508a11:2345_5: So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2345_6: sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā abhayoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patto hetusampattiyā codiyamāno ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2345_7: vihāraṁ gato satthu dhammadesanaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2345_9: Athassa ekadivasaṁ gāmaṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṁ mātugāmaṁ disvā ayonisomanasikāravasena tassa rūpaṁ ārabbha chandarāgo uppajji,
atk-s0508a11:2345_10: so vihāraṁ pavisitvā “satiṁ vissajjitvā olokentassa rūpārammaṇe mayhaṁ kileso uppanno,
atk-s0508a11:2345_11: ayuttaṁ mayā kata”nti attano cittaṁ niggaṇhanto tāvadeva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2355_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano kilesuppattinidassanena “kilese anuvattentassa vaṭṭadukkhato nattheva sīsukkhipanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2357_0: “Rūpaṁ disvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto;
atk-s0508a11:2359_0: Tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā, bhavamūlopagāmino”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2360_5: Sati muṭṭhāti asubhasabhāve kāye “asubha”ntveva pavattanasati naṭṭhā.
atk-s0508a11:2360_6: Yathā pana rūpaṁ disvā sati naṭṭhā,
atk-s0508a11:2360_8: Yathāupaṭṭhitaṁ ārammaṇaṁ “subhaṁ sukha”ntiādinā piyanimittaṁ katvā ayonisomanasikārena manasikaroto sati muṭṭhāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a11:2360_9: Tathā bhūtova sārattacitto vedetīti suṭṭhu rattacitto hutvā taṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ anubhavati abhinandati,
atk-s0508a11:2360_10: abhinandanto pana tañca ajjhosa tiṭṭhati ajjhosāya taṁ ārammaṇaṁ gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā vattati ceva,
atk-s0508a11:2360_11: evaṁbhūtassa ca tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā bhavamūlopagāminoti bhavassa saṁsārassa mūlabhāvaṁ kāraṇabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2360_12: upagamanasabhāvā kāmāsavādayo cattāropi āsavā tassa puggalassa uparūpari vaḍḍhantiyeva,
atk-s0508a11:2360_14: Mayhaṁ pana paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhatvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā saccāni paṭivijjhantassa maggapaṭipāṭiyā te cattāropi
atk-s0508a11:2363_0: Saddaṁsutvā sati muṭṭhāti āyasmato uttiyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2363_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0508a11:2363_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannacitto gonakādiatthataṁ
atk-s0508a11:2363_4: sauttaracchadaṁ buddhārahaṁ pallaṅkaṁ gandhakuṭiyaṁ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2363_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṁ sakyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2363_7: So vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karonto
atk-s0508a11:2363_8: ekadivasaṁ nāmaṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho antarāmagge mātugāmassa gītasaddaṁ sutvā ayonisomanasikāravasena tattha
atk-s0508a11:2363_9: chandarāge uppanne paṭisaṅkhānabalena taṁ vikkhambhetvā vihāraṁ pavisitvā sañjātasaṁvego divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā
atk-s0508a11:2373_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano kilesuppattinidassanena “kilese ajigucchantassa natthi vaṭṭadukkhato sīsukkhipanaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2375_0: “Saddaṁ sutvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto;
atk-s0508a11:2377_0: Tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā, saṁsāra upagāmino”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2384_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:2384_3: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ sikhiṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso bandhujīvakapupphehi
atk-s0508a11:2384_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṁ sakyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2384_7: So vayappatto cumbaṭakalahavūpasamanatthaṁ satthari āgate buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā pasannamānaso saraṇesu
atk-s0508a11:2384_8: patiṭṭhito puna nigrodhārāme satthari viharante satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco
atk-s0508a11:2384_9: vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2396_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attanā adhigataṁ vimuttisukhaṁ nissāya uppannapītisomanasso udānavasena –
atk-s0508a11:2400_2: Satipaṭṭhānagocaroti kāyānupassanādayo satipaṭṭhānā gocaro pavattiṭṭhānaṁ etassāti satipaṭṭhānagocaro,
atk-s0508a11:2400_5: tehi sabbaso sammadeva sañchanno vibhūsito alaṅkatoti vimuttikusumasañchanno.
atk-s0508a11:2400_6: Parinibbissatyanāsavoti evaṁ sammā paṭipajjanto bhikkhu nacirasseva anāsavo hutvā parinibbissati saupādisesāya
atk-s0508a11:2405_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito ekatiṁse kappe vessabhussa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a11:2405_3: vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṁ gantvā gharāvāsaṁ pahāya isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā isīhi parivuto
atk-s0508a11:2405_4: vicaranto ekadivasaṁ vessabhuṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pītisomanassajāto satthu ñāṇasampattiṁ nissāya pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2405_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a11:2405_7: belaṭṭhānikoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patto satthu dhammadesanaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2405_8: gahetvā kosalaraṭṭhe araññe viharanto alaso kāyadaḷhibahulo pharusavāco ahosi,
atk-s0508a11:2409_1: So satthāraṁ purato nisinnaṁ viya disvā tañca gāthaṁ sutvā saṁvegajāto ñāṇassa paripākaṁ gatattā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2411_0: Obhāsentaṁ disā sabbā, osadhiṁ viya tārakaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2421_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthu ovādaṁ paṭipūjento byatirekamukhena ca aññaṁ byākaronto tameva gāthaṁ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2422_0: Tattha hitvā gihittanti gahaṭṭhabhāvaṁ pariccajitvā pabbajitvāti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2422_2: yadatthaṁ sāsane pabbajantassa anurūpapariññādīnaṁ atīritattā apariyositabhāvo akatakaraṇīyoti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2422_7: Naṅgalena viya pathaviṁ paresu pharusavācappayogena attānaṁ khanantoti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2422_14: Ettha ca yathā pabbajitvā anavositādisabhāvatāya punappunaṁ gabbhamupeti mando,
atk-s0508a11:2422_16: Tabbiparītasabhāvatāya pana sammāpaṭipattiyā matthakaṁ pāpitattā parinibbāyatīti byatirekamukhena aññaṁ byākāsīti daṭṭhabbanti.
atk-s0508a11:2425_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto tissassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0508a11:2425_3: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ tissaṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso sumadhuraṁ
atk-s0508a11:2425_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde aññatarassa maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2425_7: So pitari mate rajje patiṭṭhito ussāhasattīnaṁ abhāvena rājakiccāni virādhento rajjaṁ parahatthagataṁ
atk-s0508a11:2425_8: katvā dukkhappattiyā saṁvegajāto janapadacārikaṁ carantaṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā
atk-s0508a11:2425_9: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā parikammaṁ karonto tadaheva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2438_0: Lābhālābhena mathitā, samādhiṁ nādhigacchantī”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2439_0: Tattha mānena vañcitāseti “seyyohamasmī”tiādinayappavattena mānena attukkaṁsanaparavambhanādivasena kusalabhaṇḍacchedanena vippaladdhā.
atk-s0508a11:2439_1: Saṅkhāresu saṁkilissamānāseti ajjhattikabāhiresu cakkhādīsu ceva rūpādīsu ca saṅkhatadhammesu saṁkilissamānā,
atk-s0508a11:2439_4: eso me attā”ti taṁnimittaṁ taṇhāgāhādivasena saṁkilesaṁ āpajjamānā.
atk-s0508a11:2439_5: Lābhālābhena mathitāti pattacīvarādīnañceva vatthādīnañca lābhena tesaṁyeva ca alābhena taṁnimittaṁ uppannehi
atk-s0508a11:2439_8: Samādhiṁ nādhigacchantīti te evarūpā puggalā samādhiṁ samathavipassanāvasena cittekaggataṁ kadācipi na
atk-s0508a11:2439_9: vindanti na paṭilabhanti na pāpuṇanti samādhisaṁvattanikānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhāvato,
atk-s0508a11:2439_11: Idhāpi yathā mānādīhi abhibhūtā aviddasuno samādhiṁ nādhigacchanti,
atk-s0508a11:2439_13: Te pana mādisā tehi anabhibhūtā samādhiṁ adhigacchantevāti byatirekamukhena aññābyākaraṇanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2442_0: Nāhaṁ etena atthikoti āyasmato bandhurattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2442_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle aññatarassa rañño antepure gopako hutvā
atk-s0508a11:2442_3: ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ saparisaṁ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṁ disvā pasannacitto kaṇaverapupphāni gahetvā sasaṅghaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2442_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sīlavatīnagare seṭṭhiputto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2442_7: So viññutaṁ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena sāvatthiyaṁ gato upāsakehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gato satthu dhammadesanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2442_8: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā ñāṇassa paripākattā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2448_0: Buddhassa visuṁ katvāna, tato bhiyyo samokiriṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2454_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā kataññubhāve ṭhatvā attano upakārassa rañño paccupakāraṁ kātuṁ sīlavatīnagaraṁ gantvā rañño dhammaṁ desento saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0508a11:2454_1: Rājā saccapariyosāne sotāpanno hutvā attano nagare sudassanaṁ nāma mahantaṁ vihāraṁ kāretvā therassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0508a11:2454_3: Thero vihāraṁ sabbañca lābhasakkāraṁ saṅghassa niyyātetvā sayaṁ purimaniyāmeneva piṇḍāya caritvā yāpento
atk-s0508a11:2454_4: katipāhaṁ tattha vasitvā sāvatthiṁ gantukāmo ahosi. Bhikkhū, “bhante,
atk-s0508a11:2457_0: Pitvā rasaggamuttamaṁ, na ca kāhāmi visena santhava”nti. –
atk-s0508a11:2459_0: Tattha nāhaṁ etena atthikoti yena maṁ tumhe tappetukāmā “paripūressāmā”ti vadatha,
atk-s0508a11:2459_3: santuṭṭhi paramaṁ sukhanti itarītareheva paccayehi yāpemīti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2459_4: Idāni tena anatthikabhāve padhānakāraṇaṁ dassento āha “sukhito dhammarasena tappito”ti.
atk-s0508a11:2459_5: Sattatiṁsabodhipakkhiyadhammarasena ceva navavidhalokuttaradhammarasena ca tappito pīṇito sukhito uttamena sukhena suhitoti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2459_6: Pitvā rasaggamuttamanti sabbarasesu aggaṁ seṭṭhaṁ tatoyeva uttamaṁ yathāvuttaṁ dhammarasaṁ pivitvā ṭhito, tenāha –
atk-s0508a11:2459_8: Na ca kāhāmi visena santhavanti evarūpaṁ rasuttamaṁ dhammarasaṁ pivitvā ṭhito visena visasadisena visarasena santhavaṁ saṁsaggaṁ na karissāmi,
atk-s0508a11:2462_0: Lahukovata me kāyoti āyasmato khitakattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2462_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a11:2462_3: yakkhasenāpati hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṁ yakkhasamāgame nisinno satthāraṁ aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisinnaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2462_4: disvā upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a11:2462_6: So dhammaṁ sutvā uḷāraṁ pītisomanassaṁ pavedento apphoṭento uṭṭhahitvā satthāraṁ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a11:2462_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2462_9: So viññutaṁ patto mahāmoggallānattherassa mahiddhikabhāvaṁ sutvā “iddhimā bhavissāmī”ti pubbahetunā codiyamāno
atk-s0508a11:2462_10: pabbajitvā bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā samathavipassanāsu kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2474_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā savisesaṁ iddhīsu vasībhāvena anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhonto iddhipāṭihāriyena
atk-s0508a11:2474_1: anusāsanīpāṭihāriyena ca sattānaṁ anuggahaṁ karonto viharati.
atk-s0508a11:2476_0: “Lahuko vata me kāyo, phuṭṭho ca pītisukhena vipulena;
atk-s0508a11:2477_0: Tūlamiva eritaṁ mālutena, pilavatīva me kāyo”ti. –
atk-s0508a11:2479_0: Tattha lahuko vata me kāyoti nīvaraṇādivikkhambhanena cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena caturiddhipādakabhāvanāya
atk-s0508a11:2479_1: suṭṭhu ciṇṇavasībhāvena ca me rūpakāyo sallahuko vata,
atk-s0508a11:2479_2: yena dandhaṁ mahābhūtapaccayampi nāma imaṁ karajakāyaṁ cittavasena pariṇāmemīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:2479_3: Phuṭṭho ca pītisukhenavipulenāti sabbatthakameva pharantena mahatā uḷārena pītisahitena sukhena phuṭṭho ca me kāyoti yojanā.
atk-s0508a11:2479_7: Sukhassa pharaṇañcettha taṁsamuṭṭhānarūpavasena daṭṭhabbaṁ kathaṁ pana catutthajjhānasamaṅgino pītisukhapharaṇaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2479_13: upekkhā hi idha santasabhāvatāya ñāṇavisesayogato ca sukhanti adhippetaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2479_15: Pādakajjhānārammaṇena rūpakāyārammaṇena vā iddhicittena sahajātaṁ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamati
atk-s0508a11:2479_16: pavisati phusati sampāpuṇātīti ayampi tattha attho.
atk-s0508a11:2479_19: Upekkhā hi santaṁ sukhanti vuttaṁ sāyeva saññā nīvaraṇehi ceva vitakkādipaccanīkehi ca vimuttattā lahusaññātipi veditabbā.
atk-s0508a11:2479_20: Taṁ okkantassa panassa karajakāyopi tūlapicu viya sallahuko hoti.
atk-s0508a11:2479_21: So evaṁ vātakkhittatūlapicuno viya sallahukena dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0508a11:2479_25: yadāhaṁ brahmalokaṁ aññaṁ vā iddhiyā gantukāmo homi,
atk-s0508a11:2479_26: tadā mālutena vāyunā eritaṁ cittaṁ tūlapicu viya ākāsaṁ laṅghantoyeva me kāyo hotīti.
atk-s0508a11:2482_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle himavantato avidūre aññatarasmiṁ jātassare sakuṇo hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2482_3: padumuttaro bhagavā taṁ anuggaṇhanto tattha gantvā jātassaratīre caṅkamati.
atk-s0508a11:2482_4: Sakuṇo bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso sare kumudāni gahetvā bhagavantaṁ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a11:2482_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kurukacchanagare aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2482_7: So viññutaṁ patto pacchābhūmahātheraṁ upasaṅkamitvā tassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto viharati.
atk-s0508a11:2482_15: Evaṁ viharanto ca hetusampannatāya mahāpurisajātikatāya ca nacirasseva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2496_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā udānento –
atk-s0508a11:2499_0: Na tvevānatthasaṁhitaṁ, vase vāsaṁ vicakkhaṇo”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2500_0: Tattha ukkaṇṭhitopi na vaseti yasmiṁ āvāse vasantassa me bhojanasappāyālābhena adhikusalesu dhammesu ukkaṇṭhā anabhirati uppajjati,
atk-s0508a11:2500_1: tattha ukkaṇṭhitopi vasāmiyeva itarasappāyalābhena na pakkame na pakkamāmi.
atk-s0508a11:2500_4: Ramamānopi pakkameti yasmiṁ pana āvāse vasantassa me paccayavekallābhāvena natthi ukkaṇṭhā,
atk-s0508a11:2500_10: Parassa ovādadāne pana vaseyya na pakkameyyāti vidhānavasena yojetabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2500_12: vase vāsaṁ vicakkhaṇoti yasmiṁ āvāse paccayā sulabhā,
atk-s0508a11:2500_16: evarūpo āvāso idha anatthasaṁhito nāma avaḍḍhisahitoti katvā.
atk-s0508a11:2500_17: Evarūpaṁ vāsaṁ vicakkhaṇo viññujātiko sakatthaṁ paripūretukāmo natveva vaseyya.
atk-s0508a11:2503_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto ito dvānavute
atk-s0508a11:2503_3: kappe tissassa bhagavato kāle vanacaro hutvā vane vasati,
atk-s0508a11:2503_4: taṁ anuggahituṁ bhagavā araññaṁ pavisitvā tassa āsanne ṭhāne aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0508a11:2503_5: So bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannacitto sugandhāni punnāgapupphāni ocinitvā bhagavantaṁ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a11:2503_6: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2503_7: pāriyantadese vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2503_9: So viññutaṁ patto saṅkassanagare migadāye viharantaṁ bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a11:2503_10: pabbajitvā tepiṭako hutvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño paṭisambhidāpatto ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2513_4: Evaṁ cintetvā pabhinnapaṭisambhidatāya akilāsutāya ca attano santikaṁ upagate bhikkhū yathārahaṁ ovadanto
atk-s0508a11:2513_5: anusāsanto kaṅkhaṁ chindanto dhammaṁ kathento kammaṭṭhānaṁ niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ katvā ācikkhanto viharati.
atk-s0508a11:2513_6: Athekadivasaṁ attano santikaṁ upagatānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ viññūnañca puggalānaṁ visesaṁ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a11:2516_0: Ekaṅgadassī dummedho, satadassī ca paṇḍito”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2517_2: tāni pana sataṁ anekāni liṅgāni etassāti sataliṅgo.
atk-s0508a11:2517_4: “sataṁ sahassa”ntiādīsu viya na saṅkhyāvisesattho tassa sataliṅgassa.
atk-s0508a11:2517_10: Yena liṅgena pavattinimittena tāvatiṁsādhipatimhi indasaddo pavatto,
atk-s0508a11:2518_2: paccayabhāvino atthassa attano phalaṁ paṭicca paccayabhāvo,
atk-s0508a11:2518_3: tena hi so ayaṁ imassa kāraṇanti lakkhīyati.
atk-s0508a11:2518_4: So ca ekasseva atthassa anekappabhedo upalabbhati,
atk-s0508a11:2518_7: tassa tassa atthassa saṅkhatatādayo pakāravisesā te pana atthato avatthāvisesā veditabbā.
atk-s0508a11:2518_8: Te ca pana tesaṁ aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇaṁ liṅgenti ñāpentīti “liṅgānī”ti ca vuccanti.
atk-s0508a11:2518_14: “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṁ āgacchantī”ti.
atk-s0508a11:2519_0: Ekaṅgadassī dummedhoti evaṁ anekaliṅge anekalakkhaṇe atthe yo tattha ekaṅgadassī aputhupaññatāya ekaliṅgamattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2519_1: ekalakkhaṇamattañca disvā attanā diṭṭhameva “idameva sacca”nti abhinivissa “moghamañña”nti itaraṁ paṭikkhipati,
atk-s0508a11:2519_2: hatthidassanakaandho viya ekaṅgagāhī dummedho duppañño tattha vijjamānānaṁyeva pakāravisesānaṁ ajānanato micchā abhinivisanato ca.
atk-s0508a11:2519_3: Satadassī ca paṇḍitoti paṇḍito pana tattha vijjamāne anekepi pakāre attano paññācakkhunā sabbaso passati.
atk-s0508a11:2519_4: Yo vā tattha labbhamāne aneke paññācakkhunā attanāpi passati,
atk-s0508a11:2519_6: so paṇḍito vicakkhaṇo atthesu kusalo nāmāti.
atk-s0508a11:2519_7: Evaṁ thero ukkaṁsagataṁ attano paṭisambhidāsampattiṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vibhāvesi.
atk-s0508a11:2522_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle suvaccho nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū gharāvāse
atk-s0508a11:2522_3: dosaṁ disvā tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññāyatane pabbatantare assamaṁ kāretvā bahūhi tāpasehi saddhiṁ vasi.
atk-s0508a11:2522_4: Athassa kusalabījaṁ ropetukāmo padumuttaro bhagavā assamasamīpe ākāse ṭhatvā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ dassesi.
atk-s0508a11:2522_5: So taṁ disvā pasannamānaso pūjetukāmo nāgapupphāni ocināpesi. Satthā,
atk-s0508a11:2522_7: So pupphāni gahetvā satthu gamanamaggaṁ okiritvā cittaṁ pasādento añjaliṁ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2522_8: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe
atk-s0508a11:2522_9: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā dhammasavoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patto hetusampattiyā codiyamāno gharāvāse ādīnavaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2522_10: pabbajjāya ānisaṁsañca disvā dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ viharantaṁ bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a11:2522_11: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2536_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā somanassappatto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a11:2539_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2540_0: Tattha pabbajiṁ tulayitvānāti “sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho”tiādinā gharāvāse,
atk-s0508a11:2540_1: “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā”tiādinā kāmesu ādīnavaṁ tappaṭipakkhato nekkhamme ca ānisaṁsaṁ tulabhūtāya paññāya vicāretvā vīmaṁsitvāti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2543_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto bhūtagaṇe nāma
atk-s0508a11:2543_3: pabbate viharantaṁ paccekasambuddhaṁ disvā pasannamānaso tiṇasūlapupphehi pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2543_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe
atk-s0508a11:2543_5: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto dārapariggahaṁ katvā dhammasavaṁ nāma puttaṁ labhitvā tasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2543_8: atha kasmā nāhaṁ pabbajissāmī”ti sañjātasaṁvego satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2551_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso udānento –
atk-s0508a11:2554_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2555_4: Idameva ca imassa therassa aññābyākaraṇaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2558_0: Na nūnāyaṁ paramahitānukampinoti āyasmato saṅgharakkhitattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2558_2: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a11:2558_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ pabbatapāde vasante satta paccekasambuddhe disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2558_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ ibbhakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2558_7: So viññutaṁ patto paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ sahāyaṁ katvā araññe viharati.
atk-s0508a11:2558_8: Therassa vasanaṭṭhānato avidūre vanagumbe ekā migī vijāyitvā taruṇaṁ chāpaṁ rakkhantī chātajjhattāpi puttasinehena dūre gocarāya na gacchati,
atk-s0508a11:2558_12: na taṁ chindituṁ sakkotī”ti saṁvegajāto tameva aṅkusaṁ katvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2560_0: Tamhi pabbatapādamhi, satta buddhā vasanti te.
atk-s0508a11:2562_0: Ubho hatthehi paggayha, satta buddhe samokiriṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2568_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano dutiyakaṁ bhikkhuṁ micchāvitakkabahulaṁ viharantaṁ ñatvā tameva migiṁ upamaṁ karitvā taṁ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a11:2571_0: Tathāhayaṁ viharati pākatindriyo, migī yathā taruṇajātikā vane”ti. –
atk-s0508a11:2573_5: paramena vā anuttarena hitena satte anukampanasīlassa bhagavato.
atk-s0508a11:2573_8: Anuvigaṇetīti ettha “na nūnā”ti padadvayaṁ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ “nānuvigaṇeti nūnā”ti,
atk-s0508a11:2573_16: Pākatindriyoti manacchaṭṭhānaṁ indriyānaṁ yathāsakaṁ visayesu vissajjanato sabhāvabhūtaindriyo,
atk-s0508a11:2573_18: Yassa taṇhāsaṅgassa acchinnatāya so bhikkhu pākatindriyo viharati,
atk-s0508a11:2573_19: tassa upamaṁ dassento “migī yathā taruṇajātikā vane”ti āha.
atk-s0508a11:2573_20: Yathā ayaṁ taruṇasabhāvā migī puttasnehassa acchinnatāya vane dukkhaṁ anubhavati,
atk-s0508a11:2573_22: evamayampi bhikkhu saṅgassa acchinnatāya pākatindriyo viharanto vaṭṭadukkhaṁ nātivattatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:2573_25: Taṁ sutvā so bhikkhu sañjātasaṁvego vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2576_0: Nagā nagaggesu susaṁvirūḷhāti āyasmato usabhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2576_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni karonto ito ekatiṁse
atk-s0508a11:2576_3: kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle devaputto hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso dibbapupphehi
atk-s0508a11:2576_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2576_9: So viññutaṁ patto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe satthari laddhappasādo pabbajitvā katapubbakicco araññe pabbatapāde viharati.
atk-s0508a11:2576_10: Tena ca samayena pāvusakālameghe abhippavuṭṭhe pabbatasikharesu rukkhagacchalatāya ghanapaṇṇasaṇḍino honti.
atk-s0508a11:2576_11: Athekadivasaṁ thero leṇato nikkhamitvā taṁ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṁ pabbatarāmaṇeyyakañca disvā yonisomanasikāravasena
atk-s0508a11:2576_12: “imepi nāma rukkhādayo acetanā utusampattiyā vaḍḍhiṁ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0508a11:2576_13: atha kasmā nāhaṁ utusappāyaṁ labhitvā guṇehi vaḍḍhiṁ pāpuṇissāmī”ti cintento –
atk-s0508a11:2579_0: Vivekakāmassa araññasaññino, janeti bhiyyo usabhassa kalyata”nti. –
atk-s0508a11:2581_4: Susaṁvirūḷhāti suṭṭhu samantato virūḷhamūlā hutvā parito upari ca sammadeva sañjātasākhaggapallavappasākhāti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2581_5: Udaggameghena navena sittāti paṭhamuppannena uḷārena mahatā pāvusameghena abhippavuṭṭhā.
atk-s0508a11:2581_8: idāni upadhivivekādhigamassa nissayabhūto cittaviveko laddhabboti taṁ patthayamānassa,
atk-s0508a11:2581_13: tasmā sā mayā hatthagatā kātabbāti evaṁ araññagatasaññino nekkhammasaṅkappabahulassāti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2581_21: Evaṁ thero imaṁ gāthaṁ vadantoyeva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2596_0: Duppabbajjaṁve duradhivāsā gehāti āyasmato jentattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a11:2596_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle devaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:2596_3: So ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannacitto kiṁkirātapupphehi pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2596_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe jentagāme ekassa maṇḍalikarājassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2596_6: So viññutaṁ patto daharakāleyeva hetusampattiyā codiyamāno pabbajjāninnamānaso hutvā puna cintesi –
atk-s0508a11:2596_11: kiṁ nu kho kattabba”nti evaṁ pana cintābahulo hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṁ satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ suṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2596_12: Sutakālato paṭṭhāya pabbajjābhirato hutvā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a11:2601_0: “Ito ca navame kappe, rājā sattuttamo ahuṁ;
atk-s0508a11:2604_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhanto,
atk-s0508a11:2604_1: “asakkhiṁ vatāhaṁ ādito mayhaṁ uppannavitakkaṁ chinditu”nti somanassajāto vitakkassa uppannākāraṁ tassa ca sammadeva chinnataṁ dassento –
atk-s0508a11:2606_0: “Duppabbajjaṁ ve duradhivāsā gehā, dhammo gambhīro duradhigamā bhogā;
atk-s0508a11:2607_0: Kicchā vutti no itarītareneva, yuttaṁ cintetuṁ satatamaniccata”nti. –
atk-s0508a11:2609_0: Tattha duppabbajjanti appaṁ vā mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhañceva ñātiparivaṭṭañca pahāya imasmiṁ sāsane
atk-s0508a11:2609_1: uraṁ datvā pabbajanassa dukkarattā dukkhaṁ pabbajanaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2609_11: tasmiṁ tasmiñca kattabbe kariyamānepi gharāvāso chiddaghaṭo viya mahāsamuddo viya ca duppūro,
atk-s0508a11:2609_12: tasmā gehā nāmete adhivasituṁ āvasituṁ dukkhā dukkarāti katvā duradhivāsā durāvāsāti.
atk-s0508a11:2609_19: duradhigamā bhogā yehi vinā na sakkā gehaṁ āvasituṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2609_20: te bhogā dukkhena kasirena adhigantabbatāya duradhigamā.
atk-s0508a11:2609_21: Evaṁ sante gharāvāsaṁ pahāya pabbajjaṁyeva anutiṭṭheyyaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2609_22: evampi kicchā vutti no itarītarena idha imasmiṁ buddhasāsane itarītarena yathāladdhena paccayena amhākaṁ vutti jīvikā kicchā dukkhā,
atk-s0508a11:2609_23: gharāvāsānaṁ duradhivāsatāya bhogānañca duradhigamatāya gehe itarītarena paccayena yāpetabbatāya kicchā kasirā vutti amhākaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2609_25: Yuttaṁ cintetuṁ satatamaniccataṁ sakalaṁ divasaṁ pubbarattāpararattañca tebhūmakadhammajātaṁ aniccatanti,
atk-s0508a11:2609_26: tato uppādavayavantato ādiantavantato tāvakālikato ca na niccanti “anicca”nti cintetuṁ vipassituṁ yuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2609_27: Aniccānupassanāya siddhāya itarānupassanā sukheneva sijjhantīti aniccānupassanāva ettha vuttā,
atk-s0508a11:2609_28: aniccassa dukkhānattatānaṁ abyabhicaraṇato sāsanikassa sukhaggahaṇato ca. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a11:2609_33: “vayadhammā saṅkhārā”ti ca tadaminā evaṁ aññamaññaṁ paṭipakkhavasena aparāparaṁ uppanne vitakke niggahetvā
atk-s0508a11:2609_34: aniccatāmukhena vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā idāni katakicco jātoti dasseti.
atk-s0508a11:2612_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalabījaṁ ropento vipassissa
atk-s0508a11:2612_3: bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ raññā nāgarehi ca saddhiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2612_4: buddhapūjaṁ katvā tato paraṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa
atk-s0508a11:2612_7: So viññutaṁ patvā brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ gato vimuttiṁ gavesanto tattha sāraṁ adisvā paribbājakapabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2612_8: pabbajitvā vicaranto satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchitvā tasmiṁ vissajjite pasannamānaso satthu
atk-s0508a11:2612_9: santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2624_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a11:2627_0: Sadattho me anuppatto, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;

atk-s0508a11:2892_16: Aññasseva sarāmi attānanti imaṁ mama attabhāvaṁ aññassa sattassa viya sarāmi upadhāremi sañjānāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2892_17: Tassevaṁ aniccataṁ manasi karontassa daḷhataro saṁvego udapādi,
atk-s0508a11:2892_18: so saṁvegajāto satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2894_0: Gahetvā saḷalaṁ mālaṁ, maṇḍapaṁ kārayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2897_0: “Divā vā yadi vā rattiṁ, caṅkamanto ṭhito cahaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:2902_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvāpi thero attano purimuppannaṁ aniccatāmanasikāraṁ vibhāvento tameva gāthaṁ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2905_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto ito catunavute
atk-s0508a11:2905_3: kappe ekaṁ paccekasambuddhaṁ bhikkhāya gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso kadaliphalāni adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2905_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2905_7: So daharo hutvā hatthisikkhādisikkhanakālepi hetusampannatāya nissaraṇajjhāsayova hutvā vicaranto satthu
atk-s0508a11:2905_8: dhammadesanākāle vihāraṁ gantvā parisapariyante nisinno dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho satthu santike
atk-s0508a11:2905_9: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2913_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā aparabhāge aciraparinibbute satthari dhammaṁ saṅgāyituṁ saṅketaṁ katvā mahātheresu
atk-s0508a11:2913_1: tattha tattha viharantesu ekadivasaṁ āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ sekhaṁyeva samānaṁ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2913_2: dhammaṁ desentaṁ disvā tassa uparimaggādhigamāya ussāhaṁ janento –
atk-s0508a11:2916_0: Jhāya gotama mā ca pamādo, kiṁ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī”ti. –
atk-s0508a11:2918_5: tesu rukkhamūlaggahaṇena ṭhānassa chāyāsampannatāya vātātapaparissayābhāvaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a11:2918_9: Nibbānaṁ hadayasmiṁ opiyāti “evaṁ mayā paṭipajjitvā nibbānaṁ adhigantabba”nti nibbutiṁ hadaye ṭhapetvā citte karitvā.
atk-s0508a11:2918_13: Mā ca pamādoti adhikusalesu dhammesu mā pamādaṁ āpajji.
atk-s0508a11:2918_15: taṁ paṭikkhepavasena dassento “kiṁ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a11:2918_18: evaṁ biḷibiḷikāsadisā janapaññatti kiṁ te karissati kīdisaṁ atthaṁ tuyhaṁ sādheti,
atk-s0508a11:2918_19: tasmā janapaññattiṁ pahāya sadatthapasuto hohīti ovādaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2919_0: Taṁ sutvā aññehi vuttavisagandhavāyanavacanena saṁvegajāto bahudeva rattiṁ caṅkamena vītināmento vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2919_1: ussukkāpetvā senāsanaṁ pavisitvā mañcake nipannamattova arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2922_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0508a11:2922_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ rathiyaṁ gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2922_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2922_6: avantiraṭṭhe vaḍḍhagāme aññatarassa satthavāhassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2922_8: So vayappatto macchikāsaṇḍe cittassa gahapatino adiṭṭhasahāyo hutvā tena buddhaguṇe likhitvā pesitasāsanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2922_9: paṭilabhitvā sāsane sañjātappasādo therassa mahākaccānassa santike pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a11:2928_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā “buddhupaṭṭhānaṁ gamissāmī”ti theraṁ āpucchitvā anukkamena majjhimadesaṁ gantvā
atk-s0508a11:2928_1: satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinno, “kacci, bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a11:2928_4: “bhagavā tumhākaṁ sāsanaṁ upagatakālato paṭṭhāya mayhaṁ sabbadukkhaṁ apagataṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2928_5: sabbo parissayo vūpasanto”ti pavedanavasena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a11:2931_0: Dukkhakkhayo anuppatto, patto me āsavakkhayo”ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2932_0: Tattha pañcakkhandhā pariññātāti pañcapi me upādānakkhandhā vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya “idaṁ dukkhaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2932_2: na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbaso paricchijja ñātā,
atk-s0508a11:2932_3: na tesu kiñcipi pariññātabbaṁ atthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:2932_4: Tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakāti sabbaso pariññātattā eva tesaṁ avijjātaṇhādikassa mūlassa samucchinnattā ariyamaggena
atk-s0508a11:2932_6: Dukkhakkhayo anuppattoti chinnamūlakattāyeva ca nesaṁ vaṭṭadukkhassa khayo parikkhayo anuppatto,
atk-s0508a11:2932_8: Patto me āsavakkhayoti kāmāsavādīnaṁ sabbesaṁ āsavānaṁ khayante abhigantabbatāya “āsavakkhayo”ti laddhanāmaṁ arahattaṁ pattaṁ paṭiladdhanti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2932_10: Nibbānassa adhigatattāyeva ayaṁ mama samussayo attabhāvo antimo sabbapacchimako,
